Figure 3: Example Dynamic View - Value Warnings

Figure 4: Example Dynamic View- Details Panel

Step 3, Option B: Complete your data validation via ‚ÄòOpen Request‚Äô

For this option, you do not need to have a Smartsheet account login .
Click on the ‚ÄúOpen request‚Äù button in the validation email message.
A new internet browser window will open with a form-like setup for each entry
Review the context fields and populate the validation fields. The validation fields contain the data that will be transferred to the final dataset (Table 1).
Click next at the bottom of the screen to move through each entry that needs to be validated.
To skip an entry (e.g.¬†if you are not sure yet which answer to pick) click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù without making a selection in the ‚Äòvalidation_options‚Äô column. The next entry for validation will appear.
If you need to exit the page or stop before all entries have been validated, your choices should be saved the next time you reopen the request. Upon opening to continue, just click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù until you find an entry that needs validation.
When you get to the last entry, click ‚ÄúDone‚Äù. A pop-up message will appear asking if you are ‚ÄòReady to submit your update?‚Äô:

Click ‚ÄúGo Back‚Äù if you need to review
Click ‚ÄúSubmit Update‚Äù to submit validation
Check the ‚ÄúSend me a copy of my responses‚Äù box if you would like a copy of your responses sent to your email

If you click ‚ÄúSend me a copy of my responses‚Äù you will receive an email titled ‚ÄúUpdate Confirmation: Names and Gears‚Äù.

There will be a table summarizing which entries were updated. Entries in which no option was selected in ‚Äôvalidation_options‚Äù will not be included.
This email may contain a link to a sheet name ‚ÄúData Validation - Names and Gears‚Äù; however, access to this sheet is locked.

To see any remaining validation needed, you will need to wait for the next update request email or open the Dynamic View.

Figure 5: Example of ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù format

Frequently Asked Questions:

Can multiple people work on data validation at the same time?


Yes, however, once an entry (row) has been validated in Dynamic View it will no longer be visible.


Do I need a Smartsheet account?


Only to complete data validation via Dynamic View (i.e.¬†the table view). You do not need a paid account, with a free trial or free version (once your trial is completed), you will be able to view and interact with all the Smartsheet files.


What happens after data is validated?


In some cases, data will undergo additional review by the Blue Ventures data team. Validated data will be updated in the database, and when appropriate, dropdown menus will be updated in the Kobo reference files and forms (Figure 6). Data that has not been validated will not appear in the dashboard visualizations or statistics, but will be available in the raw data download.

If at any time you encounter any errors, have questions, or need support for completing the data validation, please contact us at mary.mccabe@blueventures.org.
Figure 6: Data Validation to Reference File Workflow

title: Data Validation
text:
All data that flows through the fisheries data system is validated in Smartsheet. Data is sent for validation under three scenarios; 1) new names or ‚Äòother‚Äô information are manually added in Kobo Collect, 2) a numeric value falls beyond established thresholds or 3) names in the dataset do not have a corresponding match in a reference file. Once data is validated, both the datasets in the database and the reference tables are updated. Reference tables serve as inputs for dropdown lists in KoboToolbox forms and contain data that is added to the datasets through joins. See the decision tree below (Figure 1).
Data triggered for validation is sent to one of four tables: 1) Names and Gears, 2) Value Warnings, 3) Species or 4) Other. The instructions below detail the data validation process in Smartsheet Dynamic View for the four validation tables. Each validation table will require either selecting the correct field value from a dropdown list or entering correct values manually. The process will be appended for future data validation needs, as required.
The ‚ÄòNames and Gears‚Äô validation table contains new data from all the Kobo surveys including the new names of fishers, buyers, data collectors, fishing grounds, landing sites and gears. ‚ÄòValue Warnings‚Äô contains numeric information collected from the Landings Monitoring or Landings Profiling survey which flagged a price, weight or length value based on a pre-established threshold. The pre-established thresholds for weight and length warnings originate from the lw_ref; and price warnings originate from the min_max_ref. The ‚ÄòSpecies‚Äô validation table contains photos and new local names from all the surveys in order to validate new species using a double verification process. Lastly, the ‚ÄòOther‚Äô data validation table contains ‚Äòother‚Äô information collected from the Landings Profiling, Community Profiling or Household Survey and is mainly validated for translational purposes.
Daily e-mail messages are sent out with information and links on how to complete the data validation (see detailed instructions below). Additional notifications from Smartsheet may be sent via email to follow-up with incomplete data validation selections, if needed.
Step 1: Provide a point of contact, names and email addresses for those responsible for data validation.

The organization managing multiple partners may provide all points of contact information.
Individual partners may provide point of contact information.
The points of contact will receive data validation notifications through email.

Step 2: Check your email for a data validation request.

You will receive an email from ‚ÄúSmartsheet Automation‚Äù (Figure 2)
The email will contain a message with links to proceed with validation through either a ‚ÄúDynamic View‚Äù or ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù. Dynamic View is a table format and Open Request will direct you to a validation form.
To open with ‚ÄúDynamic View‚Äù (Step 3, Option A), click the link that begins with ‚Äúhttps://dynamicview.smarthseet.com‚Ä¶.‚Äù
To open the update request form (Step 3, Option B), click the blue ‚ÄúOpen request‚Äù button
A preview of the entries that need to be validated will appear below this message, but you will not be able to validate any data directly in the email
At the bottom of the email, there is a link for ‚ÄúGo to the sheet‚Äù; however, the underlying sheet has restricted access. Please review your data validation via Dynamic view, Open request, or your partner-specific report (coming soon).

Figure 1: Data validation decision tree.

Figure 2: Sample Smartsheet Validation Email Message

Step 3, Option A: Complete your data validation via Dynamic View (recommended)

For this option, you will need to create a free Smartsheet account. You will be directed from the email to set up an account.
Click on the Dynamic View link in the email request.
A new internet browser window will open with a table-like setup for all entries. Here, you can easily scroll through all the entries that need validation.
Click on a row to begin validation.
A ‚ÄúDetails‚Äù panel will appear on the right.
Review the context fields and populate the validation fields. The validation fields contain the data that will be transferred to the final dataset (Table 1).
Leave a comment, ONLY IF there is something that needs our attention. Blue Ventures (BV) staff will review comments and respond appropriately.
Click the blue ‚ÄúSave‚Äù button to save your selection.
Once validated, that row will disappear from your dynamic view.
Click on the next row and repeat steps to complete validation for all entries.
You can exit and re-enter by clicking on the dynamic view link from your email or logging into your account at any time. You do not need to validate all entries in one sitting.
You can bookmark this link and return at any time.

title: Quick Guide
text:
The quick guide provides step-by-step guidance to collect and validate fisheries and community data through the system. This guidance summarizes the data collection process and outlines the protocols for updating reference files and quality control tables.
We developed four survey forms to collect data on fisheries landings and fishing communities. Detailed survey descriptions are available in the full guide in English, Bahasa Indonesian, Cebuano, French, Tagalog, Swahili, Malagasy, Spanish, Portuguese, and Tetun.
The Landings Monitoring Survey captures the minimum data, ideally daily or as often as possible, needed to track long-term trends in fisheries production, species composition, and catch value. This survey can help evaluate the effects of fisheries closures or other management strategies by comparing data before and after implementation. The survey is short and user-friendly to allow for more frequent and consistent data collection.
The Landings Profiling Survey collects detailed fisheries data on gear, effort, and size of individual fish or invertebrates alongside specialized information for specific species groups such as sex, catch quality, stylet data, and egg maturity. Catch quality of octopus includes storage methods, color, tentacle number, physical abrasions, beak quality, and skin conditions. Octopus stylet data includes sample photos and growth circumference. Egg maturity data accounts for gonad weight, color, stage, length, and line appearances in the ovary glands of female octopuses. These data complement the landings monitoring data and help partners better understand observed catch trends in fisheries production and the effects of fisheries management. The survey was designed to be performed at the beginning of involvement in a community and subsequently conducted every one to two years, before and after implementing the management strategy, or as needed to explain changes in catch observed through monitoring data.
The Community Profiling Survey gathers a comprehensive understanding of the socio-economic and fisheries landscape of a community. The survey is used when first engaging with a community and repeated when appropriate to document major shifts in fishing behavior, fisher perceptions, and resource management. Survey frequency will depend on project scope (i.e., when a change is expected to occur).
The Fisher Household Survey captures detailed fisher household information, such as household-level perceptions of fishing-related activities, income sources, daily activities, main fish species caught, reliance on fish for food, and fishing activity. The survey is used when first engaging with a community and repeated every two to five years or after management interventions to document shifts in fishing behavior, fisher perceptions, management effectiveness, food security, trust, and gender equity.




Prepare reference data

Reference data can be updated via Smartsheet and contains comprehensive information on the administrative levels of the fishing communities (country, province, district/municipality, village/community), landing sites, fishers, buyers, data collectors, species data, management areas, habitat types, gear types, and partnering organizations.
Reference data sheets are used to populate dropdown lists in the KoboToolBox survey forms and join additional data needed for analysis such as village coordinates and fisher gender.
Update reference data with new species, fishers, buyers, landing sites, villages, etc. that are needed for data collection in new areas.
It is critical that these files are up to date in order for data collection and analysis to run smoothly. Reference files are uploaded to kobo every 12-24 hours.




Set up the KoboToolbox Account

All surveys are administered through the use of a KoboToolBox form. Each of the survey forms can be shared with a KoboToolBox account.
Set up your Kobo Toolbox Account on the general server at https://kf.kobotoolbox.org/accounts/signup/
Please reach out to the team with your Kobo account details and username so the appropriate forms can be shared with your account.




Download the KoboCollect App.

The Kobo forms can be accessed through the KoboCollect free Android mobile phone app or via Enketo web form.

Load forms in KoboCollect App. See Kobo Setup for additional guidance.

Once the app is downloaded, set up the server URL, Username, and Password, which connects your KoboCollect app to the KoboToolbox server. This allows you to download deployed forms from KoboToolbox to your mobile device and also send data collected through the app back to the server. For the URL, use the general use server URL - https://kc.kobotoolbox.org.
You can access ‚ÄúProject Settings‚Äù by clicking the icon in the top right hand corner of the home screen.
On the home screen, select ‚ÄúDownload Form.‚Äù
A list of all your deployed survey forms should appear. Press ‚ÄúSelect All‚Äù to have all the survey forms sent to the app or select the ones you wish to have by selecting them manually. Then, click ‚ÄúGet Selected.‚Äù
It is important that the surveys are regularly updated to ensure the latest version of the form is being used so as to not cause issues in the data pipeline. While the webform is automatically updated when a new version of the survey is available, users must configure ‚Äúauto-update‚Äù in the app. You can set up auto-update by going to ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù and ‚ÄúForm management‚Äù.




Collect data with the KoboToolBox survey forms

Collect data by selecting ‚ÄúStart New Form‚Äù in the KoboCollect app. See detailed instructions on collecting data using the app in Kobo Setup.
At the end of the survey, select ‚ÄúFinalize.‚Äù If you want to edit the form before submitting, select ‚ÄúSave as draft.‚Äù If you selected ‚ÄúSave as draft,‚Äù your form will be sent to ‚ÄúDrafts.‚Äù Here, you can make edits to forms before you submit them to the final dataset. After you make changes, select ‚ÄúFinalize,‚Äù as mentioned above. After selecting ‚ÄúFinalize,‚Äù the form is automatically stored under ‚ÄúReady to send.‚Äù In the current version of Kobo, you can still edit forms here. In the future, however, you will not be able to edit once they are finalized, and ‚ÄúReady to send‚Äù will just be a holding place to store finalized forms until you have an internet connection to send them to the server. Select ‚ÄúSend selected‚Äù to send all forms to the server.
Data collected using the app or web form will be cleaned and stored in a central data storage system. Raw data is backed up in the KoboToolbox database.




Validate data in Smartsheet

All data that flows through the fisheries data system is validated in Smartsheet. A full step-by-step instruction guide for completing this process is found on the Data Validation page.
Data is sent for validation under two scenarios; 1) new names for a fisher, buyer, data collector or species are manually added in Kobo Collect, or 2) a numeric value falls beyond established thresholds. These entries must be verified before being included in the final dataset, visualized in the dashboard, and added to the reference files.
Any new names or flagged data are sent to the relevant quality control table in Smartsheet for field teams to validate. The quality control tables are partner-specific and can be accessed via update requests sent to your email or by visiting the Dynamic View links provided to you. Field team leads will be notified via email when data needs to be validated in the tables.
Validating new names: When a new name is entered during data collection, these entries are automatically cross-referenced against the reference files to assess whether new entries might already exist in the reference files, but perhaps spelled differently. Any similar existing entries will be added to the table under the ‚Äúref_match‚Äù columns. Team leads can then easily verify if the ‚Äúnew‚Äù data is in fact already in the reference files. Team leads will complete the ‚Äúvalidation_options‚Äù column in each table by selecting either new_data, the cross-referenced data entry from the reference file (i.e.¬†a ‚Äúref_match‚Äù), other, or remove. If ‚Äúother‚Äù is selected, you must provide a name in the ‚Äúother‚Äù column. If it‚Äôs a new local species name that needs to be validated, a column with the photo taken during data collection will be provided for reference.
Validating numeric values with threshold warnings: For any flagged data entries, team leads will complete data validation in the ‚Äúcorrect‚Äù column by selecting Y (yes, values are correct), N (no, values are not correct), or remove (data cannot be validated and should be removed from the master dataset). If no (‚ÄòN‚Äô) is selected, correct values for the numerator or denominator should be entered in the ‚Äúcorrect_numerator‚Äù and ‚Äúcorrect_denominator‚Äù columns.
Once the data have been verified in the validation tables, we will append new information to the reference file and provide necessary corrections to the master dataset.




Update translations sheet

Translations for all languages are completed by editing the appropriate sheets in Smartsheet.

Visualize and use data

Automated analyses and visualizations will be available through standardized dashboards. Datasets will also be available through download in the dashboard or direct link to another database.


Please let us know if you have any questions.
Thank you!

title: Reference Files
text:
All reference files are updated in Smartsheet Dynamic View. Reference files serve as inputs for dropdown lists in KoboToolbox forms and contain data that is added to the master datasets through joins. They contain comprehensive information on the administrative levels of the fishing communities (country, province, district, village), landing sites, fishing ground, fishers, buyers, data collectors, species, management areas, gear types, and partnering organizations. The steps below outline how to update reference files with new information.
Step 1: Create a free smartsheet account.

A free account can be created at https://www.smartsheet.com/
Select ‚ÄúTry smartsheet for free‚Äù

Step 2: Provide Blue Ventures (BV) the email address you used to create your smartsheet account.

BV will then share the reference files associated with your organization.
To view your reference files you will need to sign into smartsheet Dynamic View using your smartsheet credentials: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Once logged in to Dynamic View (not the smartsheet app), you will see a list of reference files shared with your account (Figure 1).

Figure 1: List of reference files in Dynamic View

Step 3: Click on a reference file to make updates

Once open, you can click on each row to make edits to existing data, or click the ‚ÄúNew‚Äù button in the top right corner to add new data (Figure 2).
A details panel will appear on the right hand side where you‚Äôll input the necessary information (Figure 3; Table 1). Select ‚Äúsave‚Äù on the bottom right of the details panel when you are finished updating.
To leave a comment or to ask the team any questions, select the ‚ÄúComments‚Äù tab in the details panel. All individuals that the reference file is shared with, including the BV team, will receive notification when a comment is made, so there is no need to tag any particular individual.

Figure 2: Example view of the admin2_ref in Dynamic View

Figure 3: Example view of the admin2_ref details panel in Dynamic View

Step 4: Respond to update requests when data is missing or incorrect, or to respond to a comment.

If there is incomplete or incorrect information that is essential for populating Kobo dropdowns or for joins, or if a comment is made in the sheet, an update request will be sent to all appropriate users, prompting them to update the information or respond to a comment (Figure 4). By default, everyone with access to your reference files will receive the update request.
A preview of the data that needs to be updated or responded to will appear below the email message, but you will not be able to update any data directly in the email

At the bottom of the email, there is a link for ‚ÄúGo to the sheet‚Äù; however, the underlying sheet has restricted access. Please review your data or respond to the comment via Open request.

Click on the ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù button in the email message.
A new internet browser window will open with a form-like setup for each entry (Figure 5)
Review the BV fields and populate the editable fields.
Click next at the bottom of the screen to move through each entry that needs to be updated.
To skip an entry (e.g.¬†if you are not sure yet which answer to pick) click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù without making a selection in the editable columns. The next entry that needs to be updated will appear.
If you need to exit the page or stop before all entries have been updated, your choices should be saved the next time you reopen the request. Upon opening to continue, just click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù until you find an entry that needs to be updated.
When you get to the last entry, click ‚ÄúDone‚Äù. A pop-up message will appear asking if you are ‚ÄòReady to submit your update?‚Äô:

Click ‚ÄúGo Back‚Äù if you need to review
Click ‚ÄúSubmit Update‚Äù to submit your updates.
Your updates are automatically appended to the reference file and you can view them in Dynamic View


Figure 4: Example ‚ÄúUpdate Request‚Äù email when information needs to be corrected or comment needs to be responded to.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Once I add a new admin1, how long does it take before it appears in the dropdown for admin2?


It will take approximately 15 minutes before new entries are available in the dynamic dropdowns. This applies to the admin2 dropdown in admin3_ref, the species_group dropdown in gear_ref, the admin3 dropdown in buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, etc. See Figure 5 for the full list of dynamic dropdowns and their workflow through the reference files.


Once I add or update a reference file, how long does it take before the updates appear in the Kobo surveys?


You should see an updated Kobo form in approximately 12-24 hours.


How should the names of buyers, fishers and data collectors be recorded?


Ideally, names should be as unique as possible to the individual and include their first name, last name and nickname. If an individual does not wish to share their full last name you could also use the first initial or first letter of their last name.

Dynamic dropdown connection between reference files.

title: Reference Files
text:
All reference files are updated in Smartsheet Dynamic View. Reference files serve as inputs for dropdown lists in KoboToolbox forms and contain data that is added to the master datasets through joins. They contain comprehensive information on the administrative levels of the fishing communities (country, province, district, village), landing sites, fishing ground, fishers, buyers, data collectors, species, management areas, gear types, and partnering organizations. The steps below outline how to update reference files with new information.
Step 1: Create a free smartsheet account.

A free account can be created at https://www.smartsheet.com/
Select ‚ÄúTry smartsheet for free‚Äù

Step 2: Provide Blue Ventures (BV) the email address you used to create your smartsheet account.

BV will then share the reference files associated with your organization.
To view your reference files you will need to sign into smartsheet Dynamic View using your smartsheet credentials: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Once logged in to Dynamic View (not the smartsheet app), you will see a list of reference files shared with your account (Figure 1).

Figure 1: List of reference files in Dynamic View

Step 3: Click on a reference file to make updates

Once open, you can click on each row to make edits to existing data, or click the ‚ÄúNew‚Äù button in the top right corner to add new data (Figure 2).
A details panel will appear on the right hand side where you‚Äôll input the necessary information (Figure 3; Table 1). Select ‚Äúsave‚Äù on the bottom right of the details panel when you are finished updating.
To leave a comment or to ask the team any questions, select the ‚ÄúComments‚Äù tab in the details panel. All individuals that the reference file is shared with, including the BV team, will receive notification when a comment is made, so there is no need to tag any particular individual.

Figure 2: Example view of the admin2_ref in Dynamic View

Figure 3: Example view of the admin2_ref details panel in Dynamic View

Step 4: Respond to update requests when data is missing or incorrect, or to respond to a comment.

If there is incomplete or incorrect information that is essential for populating Kobo dropdowns or for joins, or if a comment is made in the sheet, an update request will be sent to all appropriate users, prompting them to update the information or respond to a comment (Figure 4). By default, everyone with access to your reference files will receive the update request.
A preview of the data that needs to be updated or responded to will appear below the email message, but you will not be able to update any data directly in the email

At the bottom of the email, there is a link for ‚ÄúGo to the sheet‚Äù; however, the underlying sheet has restricted access. Please review your data or respond to the comment via Open request.

Click on the ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù button in the email message.
A new internet browser window will open with a form-like setup for each entry (Figure 5)
Review the BV fields and populate the editable fields.
Click next at the bottom of the screen to move through each entry that needs to be updated.
To skip an entry (e.g.¬†if you are not sure yet which answer to pick) click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù without making a selection in the editable columns. The next entry that needs to be updated will appear.
If you need to exit the page or stop before all entries have been updated, your choices should be saved the next time you reopen the request. Upon opening to continue, just click ‚ÄúNext‚Äù until you find an entry that needs to be updated.
When you get to the last entry, click ‚ÄúDone‚Äù. A pop-up message will appear asking if you are ‚ÄòReady to submit your update?‚Äô:

Click ‚ÄúGo Back‚Äù if you need to review
Click ‚ÄúSubmit Update‚Äù to submit your updates.
Your updates are automatically appended to the reference file and you can view them in Dynamic View


Figure 4: Example ‚ÄúUpdate Request‚Äù email when information needs to be corrected or comment needs to be responded to.

Table 1: The primary fields in each of the reference files. Field type ‚ÄúBV‚Äù is managed by Blue Ventures and is not editable. To request changes to any of the ‚ÄúBV‚Äù fields, please leave a comment. Only fields with field type ‚Äúeditable‚Äù can be edited. Field type ‚Äúauto‚Äù is populated automatically.

BV


lmat
Length at maturity of species (cm), sourced from rfishbase ‚Äòmaturity‚Äô tbl.
BV


lmat_type
Measurement length type for ‚Äòlmat‚Äô value. Options include: ‚ÄòTL = total length, SL = standard length, WD = width, CL = carapace length, CW = carapace width, ML = mantle length, ShL = shell length‚Äô.
BV


lmat_ref
Reference of ‚Äòlmat‚Äô value. Options include: ‚ÄòFishbase, SeaLifebase, Journal article‚Äô.
BV


final_type
Measurement length type for ‚Äòfinal_lmax‚Äô value. Options include: ‚ÄòTL = total length, SL = standard length, WD = width, CL = carapace length, CW = carapace width, ML = mantle length, ShL = shell length‚Äô.
BV


final_lmax
Final maximum length (cm) per species used in calculations, either from the ‚Äòlmax‚Äô column or the ‚Äòlmax_tl‚Äô column based on desired length type.
BV


calc_loo
Calculated ‚Äòloo‚Äô value using the ‚Äòfinal_lmax‚Äô value in the the formula ‚Äù = ( 10^(0.044 + 0.9841 *LOG10(final_lmax)))‚Äù
BV


calc_lmat
Length at maturity is estimated using the calculated value from the ‚Äòcalc_loo‚Äô column, using the formula‚Äù=(10^(0.8979 *LOG10(calc_loo) - 0.0782))‚Äù
BV


final_lmat
Final length at maturity (cm) value based on the calculation in ‚Äòcalc_lmat‚Äô column rounded to the nearest tenth.
BV


calc_limit_min
Calculation for determining the minimum length limit, auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula ‚Äú=[final_lmat]@row * 0.5‚Äù
auto


length_limit_max
Maximum length limit (cm) used for value warnings based on the ‚Äòfinal_lmax‚Äô value, auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula ‚Äú=[final_lmax]@row‚Äù
auto


length_limit_min
Minimum length limit (cm) used for value warnings based on the ‚Äòcalc_limit_min‚Äô value, auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula‚Äù=[calc_limit_min]@row‚Äù
auto


weight_limit_max
Maximum weight limit (kg) used for value warnings based on the ‚Äòlength_limit_max‚Äô, ‚Äòa‚Äô, and ‚Äòb‚Äô values, auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula ‚Äú=(([length_limit_max]@row ^ b@row) * a@row) / 1000‚Äù
auto


weight_limit_min
Minimum weight limit (kg) used for value warnings based on the ‚Äòlength_limit_min‚Äô, ‚Äòa‚Äô, and ‚Äòb‚Äô values, auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula‚Äù=(([length_limit_min]@row ^ b@row) * a@row) / 1000‚Äù
auto


avg_weight
Average weight (kg), auto-calculated in Smartsheet using the formula ‚Äú=([weight_limit_max]@row + [weight_limit_min]@row) / 2‚Äù
auto


avg_weight_refs
Reference or formula for ‚Äòavg_weight‚Äô value
BV


habitat_deepwater
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòOceanic‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_reef
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòCoralReefs‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_mangrove
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòMangroves‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_seagrass
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòSeaGrassBeds‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_mud
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòMud‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_sand
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòSand‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV


habitat_estuary
TRUE/PRESENT (1) or FALSE/ABSENT (0), sourced from the ‚ÄòEstuaries‚Äô column in the fishbase ‚Äòecology‚Äô tbl.
BV



Frequently Asked Questions:

Once I add a new admin1, how long does it take before it appears in the dropdown for admin2?


It will take approximately 15 minutes before new entries are available in the dynamic dropdowns. This applies to the admin2 dropdown in admin3_ref, the species_group dropdown in gear_ref, the admin3 dropdown in buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, etc. See Figure 5 for the full list of dynamic dropdowns and their workflow through the reference files.


Once I add or update a reference file, how long does it take before the updates appear in the Kobo surveys?


You should see an updated Kobo form in approximately 12-24 hours.


How should the names of buyers, fishers and data collectors be recorded?


Ideally, names should be as unique as possible to the individual and include their first name, last name and nickname. If an individual does not wish to share their full last name you could also use the first initial or first letter of their last name.

Dynamic dropdown connection between reference files.

title: Faili za Marejeleo
text:
Faili zote za marejeleo zimesasishwa katika Dyanamic view kwenye Smartsheet. Faili za marejeleo hutumika kama pembejeo za orodha za kuchagua katika fomu za KoboToolbox na zina takwimu ambayo imeongezwa kwenye seti kuu za takwimu kupitia viungo. Zina maelezo kamili kuhusu viwango vya utawala wa jamii za uvuvi (nchi, mkoa, wilaya, kijiji), maeneo ya kutua, eneo la uvuvi, wavuvi, wanunuzi, wakusanyaji takwimu, spishi, maeneo ya usimamizi, aina za nyenzo, na mashirika yanayoshirikiana. Hatua zifuatazo zinaelezea jinsi ya kusasisha faili za marejeleo kwa maelezo mapya. zinaelezea jinsi ya kusasisha faili za kumbukumbu na habari mpya.
Hatua ya 1: Unda akaunti ya bure ya smartsheet.

Akaunti ya bure inaweza kuundwa katika https://www.smartsheet.com/
Chagua ‚ÄúJaribu smartsheet kwa bure‚Äù

Hatua ya 2: Tafadhali mpe Blue Ventures (BV) anwani ya barua pepe uliyotumia kuunda akaunti yako ya Smartsheet.

BV kisha itashiriki faili za kumbukumbu zinazohusiana na shirika lako.
Ili kuona faili zako za kumbukumbu utahitaji kuingia kwenye smartsheet Dynamic View ukitumia habari zako za kujiunga za smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Mara baada ya kuingia Kwenye Dynamic View (sio programu ya smartsheet), utaona orodha ya faili za kumbukumbu zilizoshirikishwa na akaunti yako (Kielelezo 1).

Kielelezo 1: Orodha ya faili za kumbukumbu Katika Dynamic View

Hatua ya 3: Bofya kwenye faili ya marejeleo ili kufanya masasisho

Mara baada ya kufunguliwa, unaweza kubofya kila safu ili kufanya mabadiliko kwenye takwimu iliyopo, au bonyeza kitufe cha ‚ÄúMpya‚Äù kwenye kona ya juu kulia ili kuongeza takwimu mpya (Kielelezo 2).
Jopo la maelezo litatokea upande wa kulia ambapo utaingiza taarifa zote muhimu (Kielelezo 3; Jedwali 1). Chagua ‚Äúhifadhi‚Äù chini kulia ya jopo la maelezo ukisha maliza kusasisha.
Ili kuandika maoni au kuuliza timu maswali yoyote, chagua kitufe cha ‚ÄúMaoni‚Äù kwenye jopo la maelezo. Watu wote ambao faili ya kumbukumbu imeshirikishwa nao, ikiwemo timu ya BV, watapokea arafa pindi maoni yanapotolewa, kwa hivyo hakuna haja ya kuweka alama kwa mtu yeyote

Kielelezo 2: Mfano mtazamo wa admin2_ref Katika Dyanamic view

Kielelezo 3: Mfano wa jopo la maelezo la admin2_ref katika Maoni ya Dynamic view

Hatua ya 4: Jibu maombi ya sasisho wakati takwimu haipo au sio sahihi, au kujibu maoni.

Ikiwa kuna taarifa isiyokamilika au isiyo sahihi ambayo ni muhimu kwa kujaza orodha kunukuu za Kobo au kwa kuunganisha, au ikiwa maoni yametolewa kwenye karatasi, ombi la kusasisha litatumwa kwa watumiaji wote wanaohusika, likilazimisha wasasishe taarifa au kujibu maoni (Kielelezo 4). Kwa kawaida, kila mtu anayepata kufikia faili za kumbukumbu atapokea ombi la kusasisha.
Utaona muhtasari wa data inayohitaji kusasishwa au kujibiwa chini ya ujumbe wa barua pepe, lakini hutaweza kusasisha takwimu yoyote moja kwa moja kwenye barua pepe.

Chini ya barua pepe, kuna kiungo cha ‚ÄúNenda kwenye karatasi‚Äù; hata hivyo, karatasi ya msingi ina upatikanaji mdogo. Tafadhali kagua takwimu yako au ujibu maoni kupitia ombi Wazi.

Bonyeza kitufe cha ‚ÄúFungua Ombi‚Äù katika ujumbe wa barua pepe.
Dirisha jipya la kivinjari litafunguka lenye muundo wa fomu kwa kila ingizo (Kielelezo 5)
Pitia sehemu za BV na ujaze sehemu zinazoweza kuhaririwa.
Bofya inayofuata chini ya skrini ili upitie kila ingizo linalohitaji kusasishwa.
Ili kuruka ingizo (kwa mfano, ukiwa huna uhakika na jibu la kuchagua), bofya ‚ÄúIjayo‚Äù bila kuchagua kitu kwenye safu zinazoweza kuhaririwa. Ingizo linalofuata litakalohitaji kurekebishwa litatokea.
Ikiwa unahitaji kutoka kwenye ukurasa au kusitisha kabla ya kuhakikisha maingizo yote yamesasishwa, uchaguzi wako utalindwa wakati ujao utakapoanza tena ombi. Unapofungua kuendelea, bonyeza tu ‚ÄúIjayo‚Äù mpaka upate ingizo linalohitaji kurekebishwa.
Unapofika kwenye ingizo mwisho, bonyeza ‚ÄúImekamilika‚Äù. Ujumbe ibukizi utaonekana ukiuliza ikiwa uko Tayari kuwasilisha sasisho lako?‚Äô:

Bofya ‚ÄúRudi nyuma‚Äù ikiwa unahitaji kukagua
Bofya ‚ÄúWasilisha Sasisho‚Äù ili kuwasilisha masasisho yako.
Marekebisho yako yanaongezwa kiotomatiki kwenye faili lza kumbukumbu na unaweza kuyatazama kwenye Dynamic view.


Kielelezo 4: Mfano wa barua pepe ya ‚ÄúOmbi la Usasishaji‚Äù wakati taarifa zinahitaji kusahihishwa au maoni yanahitaji kujibiwa.

Jedwali 1: Sehemu kuu katika kila moja ya faili za kumbukumbu. Aina ya sehemu ‚ÄúBV‚Äù inasimamiwa na Blue Ventures na haiwezi kuhaririwa. Ili kuomba mabadiliko yoyote kwenye sehemu za ‚ÄúBV‚Äù tafadhali acha maoni. Ni sehemu zenye aina ya sehemu ‚Äúkurekebishwa‚Äù pekee ndizo zinazoweza kuhaririwa. Aina ya sehemu ‚Äúauto‚Äù inajazwa kiotomatiki.

Maswali Yanayoulizwa Mara Kwa Mara:

Mara tu ninapoongeza msimamizi 1 mpya, inachukua muda gani kabla ya kuonekana kwenye kushuka kwa Msimamizi 2?


Itachukua takriban dakika 15 kabla ya maingizo mapya kupatikana katika orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa dynamic. Hii inahusu orodha ya kushuka chini ya msimamizi 2 katika msimamizi 3_ref, orodha ya kushuka chini ya species_group katika gear_ref, orodha ya kushuka chini ya admin3 katika buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, nk. Tazama Mchoro 5 kwa orodha kamili ya orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa na mienendo na mtiririko wao kupitia faili za marejeleo.


Mara nitakapoongeza au kusasisha faili za kumbukumbu, inachukua muda gani kabla ya sasisho kuonekana katika tafiti za Kobo?


Unapaswa kuona fomu ya Kobo iliyosasishwa ndani ya masaa 12-24.


Majina ya wanunuzi, wavuvi, na wakusanyaji takwimu yanapaswa kurekodiwa vipi?


Kwa hali bora, majina yanapaswa kuwa ya kipekee kwa kila mtu na yakiwemo jina la kwanza, jina la mwisho, na jina la utani. Ikiwa mtu hapendi kushiriki jina lake kamili la mwisho, unaweza pia kutumia herufi ya kwanza au herufi ya kwanza ya jina lake la mwisho.

Muunganisho wa orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa na mienendo kati ya faili za kumbukumbu.

title: Faili za Marejeleo
text:
Faili zote za marejeleo zimesasishwa katika Dyanamic view kwenye Smartsheet. Faili za marejeleo hutumika kama pembejeo za orodha za kuchagua katika fomu za KoboToolbox na zina takwimu ambayo imeongezwa kwenye seti kuu za takwimu kupitia viungo. Zina maelezo kamili kuhusu viwango vya utawala wa jamii za uvuvi (nchi, mkoa, wilaya, kijiji), maeneo ya kutua, eneo la uvuvi, wavuvi, wanunuzi, wakusanyaji takwimu, spishi, maeneo ya usimamizi, aina za nyenzo, na mashirika yanayoshirikiana. Hatua zifuatazo zinaelezea jinsi ya kusasisha faili za marejeleo kwa maelezo mapya. zinaelezea jinsi ya kusasisha faili za kumbukumbu na habari mpya.
Hatua ya 1: Unda akaunti ya bure ya smartsheet.

Akaunti ya bure inaweza kuundwa katika https://www.smartsheet.com/
Chagua ‚ÄúJaribu smartsheet kwa bure‚Äù

Hatua ya 2: Tafadhali mpe Blue Ventures (BV) anwani ya barua pepe uliyotumia kuunda akaunti yako ya Smartsheet.

BV kisha itashiriki faili za kumbukumbu zinazohusiana na shirika lako.
Ili kuona faili zako za kumbukumbu utahitaji kuingia kwenye smartsheet Dynamic View ukitumia habari zako za kujiunga za smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Mara baada ya kuingia Kwenye Dynamic View (sio programu ya smartsheet), utaona orodha ya faili za kumbukumbu zilizoshirikishwa na akaunti yako (Kielelezo 1).

Kielelezo 1: Orodha ya faili za kumbukumbu Katika Dynamic View

Hatua ya 3: Bofya kwenye faili ya marejeleo ili kufanya masasisho

Mara baada ya kufunguliwa, unaweza kubofya kila safu ili kufanya mabadiliko kwenye takwimu iliyopo, au bonyeza kitufe cha ‚ÄúMpya‚Äù kwenye kona ya juu kulia ili kuongeza takwimu mpya (Kielelezo 2).
Jopo la maelezo litatokea upande wa kulia ambapo utaingiza taarifa zote muhimu (Kielelezo 3; Jedwali 1). Chagua ‚Äúhifadhi‚Äù chini kulia ya jopo la maelezo ukisha maliza kusasisha.
Ili kuandika maoni au kuuliza timu maswali yoyote, chagua kitufe cha ‚ÄúMaoni‚Äù kwenye jopo la maelezo. Watu wote ambao faili ya kumbukumbu imeshirikishwa nao, ikiwemo timu ya BV, watapokea arafa pindi maoni yanapotolewa, kwa hivyo hakuna haja ya kuweka alama kwa mtu yeyote

Kielelezo 2: Mfano mtazamo wa admin2_ref Katika Dyanamic view

Kielelezo 3: Mfano wa jopo la maelezo la admin2_ref katika Maoni ya Dynamic view

Hatua ya 4: Jibu maombi ya sasisho wakati takwimu haipo au sio sahihi, au kujibu maoni.

Ikiwa kuna taarifa isiyokamilika au isiyo sahihi ambayo ni muhimu kwa kujaza orodha kunukuu za Kobo au kwa kuunganisha, au ikiwa maoni yametolewa kwenye karatasi, ombi la kusasisha litatumwa kwa watumiaji wote wanaohusika, likilazimisha wasasishe taarifa au kujibu maoni (Kielelezo 4). Kwa kawaida, kila mtu anayepata kufikia faili za kumbukumbu atapokea ombi la kusasisha.
Utaona muhtasari wa data inayohitaji kusasishwa au kujibiwa chini ya ujumbe wa barua pepe, lakini hutaweza kusasisha takwimu yoyote moja kwa moja kwenye barua pepe.

Chini ya barua pepe, kuna kiungo cha ‚ÄúNenda kwenye karatasi‚Äù; hata hivyo, karatasi ya msingi ina upatikanaji mdogo. Tafadhali kagua takwimu yako au ujibu maoni kupitia ombi Wazi.

Bonyeza kitufe cha ‚ÄúFungua Ombi‚Äù katika ujumbe wa barua pepe.
Dirisha jipya la kivinjari litafunguka lenye muundo wa fomu kwa kila ingizo (Kielelezo 5)
Pitia sehemu za BV na ujaze sehemu zinazoweza kuhaririwa.
Bofya inayofuata chini ya skrini ili upitie kila ingizo linalohitaji kusasishwa.
Ili kuruka ingizo (kwa mfano, ukiwa huna uhakika na jibu la kuchagua), bofya ‚ÄúIjayo‚Äù bila kuchagua kitu kwenye safu zinazoweza kuhaririwa. Ingizo linalofuata litakalohitaji kurekebishwa litatokea.
Ikiwa unahitaji kutoka kwenye ukurasa au kusitisha kabla ya kuhakikisha maingizo yote yamesasishwa, uchaguzi wako utalindwa wakati ujao utakapoanza tena ombi. Unapofungua kuendelea, bonyeza tu ‚ÄúIjayo‚Äù mpaka upate ingizo linalohitaji kurekebishwa.
Unapofika kwenye ingizo mwisho, bonyeza ‚ÄúImekamilika‚Äù. Ujumbe ibukizi utaonekana ukiuliza ikiwa uko Tayari kuwasilisha sasisho lako?‚Äô:

Bofya ‚ÄúRudi nyuma‚Äù ikiwa unahitaji kukagua
Bofya ‚ÄúWasilisha Sasisho‚Äù ili kuwasilisha masasisho yako.
Marekebisho yako yanaongezwa kiotomatiki kwenye faili lza kumbukumbu na unaweza kuyatazama kwenye Dynamic view.


Kielelezo 4: Mfano wa barua pepe ya ‚ÄúOmbi la Usasishaji‚Äù wakati taarifa zinahitaji kusahihishwa au maoni yanahitaji kujibiwa.

Jedwali 1: Sehemu kuu katika kila moja ya faili za kumbukumbu. Aina ya sehemu ‚ÄúBV‚Äù inasimamiwa na Blue Ventures na haiwezi kuhaririwa. Ili kuomba mabadiliko yoyote kwenye sehemu za ‚ÄúBV‚Äù tafadhali acha maoni. Ni sehemu zenye aina ya sehemu ‚Äúkurekebishwa‚Äù pekee ndizo zinazoweza kuhaririwa. Aina ya sehemu ‚Äúauto‚Äù inajazwa kiotomatiki.

Maswali Yanayoulizwa Mara Kwa Mara:

Mara tu ninapoongeza msimamizi 1 mpya, inachukua muda gani kabla ya kuonekana kwenye kushuka kwa Msimamizi 2?


Itachukua takriban dakika 15 kabla ya maingizo mapya kupatikana katika orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa dynamic. Hii inahusu orodha ya kushuka chini ya msimamizi 2 katika msimamizi 3_ref, orodha ya kushuka chini ya species_group katika gear_ref, orodha ya kushuka chini ya admin3 katika buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, nk. Tazama Mchoro 5 kwa orodha kamili ya orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa na mienendo na mtiririko wao kupitia faili za marejeleo.


Mara nitakapoongeza au kusasisha faili za kumbukumbu, inachukua muda gani kabla ya sasisho kuonekana katika tafiti za Kobo?


Unapaswa kuona fomu ya Kobo iliyosasishwa ndani ya masaa 12-24.


Majina ya wanunuzi, wavuvi, na wakusanyaji takwimu yanapaswa kurekodiwa vipi?


Kwa hali bora, majina yanapaswa kuwa ya kipekee kwa kila mtu na yakiwemo jina la kwanza, jina la mwisho, na jina la utani. Ikiwa mtu hapendi kushiriki jina lake kamili la mwisho, unaweza pia kutumia herufi ya kwanza au herufi ya kwanza ya jina lake la mwisho.

Muunganisho wa orodha za kushuka chini zinazoendeshwa na mienendo kati ya faili za kumbukumbu.

title: Reference Files
text:
Ny rakitra referansa rehetra dia havaozina ao Amin‚Äôny Smartsheet Dynamic View. Ny rakitra referansa dia miasa ho toy ny fidirana ho an‚Äôny lisitra ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù amin‚Äôny endrika KoboToolbox ary misy angona izay ampiana amin‚Äôny angon-drakitra amin‚Äôny al√†lan‚Äôny fidirana. Ahitana fampahalalana feno momba ny ambaratonga ara-pitantanana ny vondrom-piarahamonina mpanjono (firenena, faritany, distrika, vohitra), toerana fiantsonana, toeram-panjonoana, mpanjono, mpividy, mpanangona antotan‚Äôisa, karazany, faritra fitantanana, karazana fitaovana ary fikambanana mpiara-miasa. Ireo dingana etsy ambany dia mamaritra ny fomba fanavaozana ireo rakitra referansa miaraka amin‚Äôny fampahalalana vaovao.
Dingana 1: Mamorona kaonty ‚Äúsmartsheet‚Äù maimaim-poana.

Azo atao ny mamorona kaonty maimaimpoana ao amin‚Äôny https://www.smartsheet.com/
Safidio ny‚ÄùTry smartsheet for free‚Äù

Dingana 2: Omeo ny Blue Ventures (BV) ny adiresy mailaka nampiasanao hamoronana ny kaontinao smartsheet.

BV dia hizara ireo rakitra fanondroana mifandraika amin‚Äôny fikambananao.
Raha te hijery ireo rakitra fanovozan-kevitra dia mila miditra amin‚Äôny Smartsheet Dynamic View ianao amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny mari-pahamantarana smartsheet anao: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Raha vao tafiditra Ao Amin‚Äôny Dynamic View (fa tsy ny fampiharana smartsheet) dia hahita lisitry ny rakitra referansa zaraina amin‚Äôny kaontinao ianao (Sary 1).

Sary 1: Lisitry ny rakitra referansa Ao Amin‚Äôny Dynamic View

Dingana 3: Tsindrio ny rakitra referansa hanaovana fanavaozana

Rehefa misokatra dia azonao atao ny manindry ny laharana tsirairay mba hanovana ny angon-drakitra efa misy, na tsindrio ny bokotra ‚ÄúVaovao‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny zoro ambony havanana raha hanampy angona vaovao (Sary 2).
Ny tontonana antsipiriany dia hiseho eo amin‚Äôny ilany havanana izay hampidiranao ny fampahalalana ilaina (Sary 3; Tabilao 1). Safidio ny‚Äù save ‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany ankavanan‚Äôny tontonana details rehefa vita ny fanavaozana.
Raha hamela fanehoan-kevitra na hametraka fanontaniana amin‚Äôny ekipan‚Äôny BV, safidio ny tabilao ‚ÄúComments‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny tontonana antsipirihany. Ireo olona rehetra izay zaraina amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa, anisan‚Äôizany ny Ekipan‚Äôny BV, dia hahazo fampandrenesana rehefa misy fanehoan-kevitra, ka tsy ilaina ny manisy marika olona manokana.

Sary 2: Ohatra fijerena momba ny admin2_ref Amin‚Äôny ‚ÄúDynamic View‚Äù

Sary 3: ohatra ny fijerena ny tontonana antsipirihany ny admin2_ref amin‚Äôny Dynamic View

Dingana 4: Famaliana ny fangatahana fanavaozana rehefa tsy hita na diso ny angona, na hamaly ny fanehoan-kevitra.

Raha misy fampahalalana tsy feno na diso izay tena ilaina amin‚Äôny fametrahana Ny ‚Äúlist dropdowns‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny Kobo na raha misy fanehoan-kevitra atao ao amin‚Äôny takelaka, dia halefa any amin‚Äôny mpampiasa voakasika rehetra ny fangatahana fanavaozana, ka manosika azy ireo hanavao ny vaovao na hamaly ny fanehoan-kevitra (Sary 4). Ny olona rehetra manana fidirana amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa dia hahazo ny fangatahana fanavaozana.
Ny fijerena mialoha ny antotan‚Äôisa mila havaozina na valiana dia hiseho eo ambanin‚Äôny hafatra mailaka, saingy tsy ho afaka hanavao ny angona mivantana amin‚Äôny mailaka ianao

Eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany amin‚Äôny mailaka, misy rohy mankany amin‚Äôny ‚ÄúGo to the sheet‚Äù; na izany aza, voafetra ny fidirana amin‚Äôny takelaka fototra. Azafady mba avereno jerena ny angon-drakitrao na valio Ny fanehoan-kevitra Amin‚Äôny Al√†lan‚Äôny ‚ÄúOpen request‚Äù.

Tsindrio ny bokotra‚Äù Open Request ‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny hafatra mailaka.
Hisokatra ny ‚Äúonglet‚Äù vaovao miaraka amin‚Äôny karazana endrika tsirairay (Sary 5)
Avereno jerena ireo saha BV ary fenoy ireo saha azo ovaina.
Tsindrio ‚Äúnext‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany amin‚Äôny efijery mba hivezivezy amin‚Äôny fidirana tsirairay izay mila havaozina.
Mba hialana amin‚Äôny fidirana (ohatra, raha mbola tsy azonao antoka izay valiny hofidiana) tsindrio ‚ÄúNext‚Äù ka tsy manao safidy ao amin‚Äôny tsanganana azo ovaina. Hiseho ny fidirana manaraka izay mila havaozina.
Raha mila mivoaka ny pejy ianao na mijanona alohan‚Äôny hanavaozana ny fidirana rehetra dia tokony hotehirizina ny safidinao amin‚Äôny fotoana hanokafanao indray ny fangatahana. Rehefa manokatra hanohy dia tsindrio fotsiny Ny ‚ÄúNext‚Äù mandra-pahitanao fidirana mila havaozina.
Rehefa tonga amin‚Äôny fidirana farany ianao dia tsindrio ‚ÄúDone‚Äù. Hisy hafatra mipoitra hanontany raha Toa ianao ka ‚ÄòVonona ny handefa ny fanavaozanao?‚Äô:

Tsindrio ‚ÄúGo Back‚Äù raha mila hanamarina ianao
Kitiho ny ‚ÄúSubmit Update‚Äù mba handefasana ny fanavaozanao.
Ny fanavaozanao dia ampidirina ho azy amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa ary azonao jerena ao amin‚Äôny Dynamic View


Sary 4: Ohatra ‚ÄúUpdate Request‚Äù mailaka rehefa mila ahitsy ny fampahalalana na mila valiana ny fanehoan-kevitra.

Tabilao 1: ny saha voalohany ao amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa tsirairay. Ny karazana saha ‚ÄúBV‚Äù dia tantanan‚Äôny Blue Ventures ary tsy azo ovaina. Mba hangataka fanovana amin‚Äôny iray amin‚Äôireo saha ‚ÄúBV‚Äù, azafady avelao ny fanehoan-kevitra. Ny saha misy karazana saha ‚Äúazo ovaina‚Äù ihany no azo ovaina. Ny karazana saha ‚Äúauto‚Äù dia mipetraka ho azy.

Karazana halavan‚Äôny fandrefesana ho an‚Äôny sanda ‚Äòlmat‚Äô. Anisan‚Äôny safidy: ‚Äòtl = halavany manontolo, sl = halavany mahazatra, wd = sakany, CL = halavan‚Äôny carapace, CW = sakany carapace, ml = halavan‚Äôny lamba firakotra, ShL = halavan‚Äôny akorandriaka‚Äô.
BV


lmat_ref
Fanondroana ny sandan‚Äôny ‚Äòlmat‚Äô. Anisan‚Äôny safidy: ‚ÄúFishbase, SeaLifebase, Journal article‚Äù.
BV


final_type
Karazana halavan‚Äôny fandrefesana ho an‚Äôny sanda‚Äô final_lmax‚Äô. Anisan‚Äôny safidy: ‚Äòtl = halavany manontolo, sl = halavany mahazatra, wd = sakany, CL = halavan‚Äôny carapace, CW = sakany carapace, ml = halavan‚Äôny lamba firakotra, ShL = halavan‚Äôny akorandriaka‚Äô.
BV


final_lmax
Ny halavany farany ambony indrindra (cm) isaky ny karazany ampiasaina amin‚Äôny kajy, na avy amin‚Äôny tsanganana ‚Äòlmax‚Äô na ny tsanganana ‚Äòlmax_tl‚Äô mifototra amin‚Äôny karazana halavany tadiavina.
BV


calc_loo
Ny sanda ‚Äòloo‚Äô voaisa amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny sanda ‚Äòfinal_lmax‚Äô ao amin‚Äôny raikipohy ‚Äù = ( 10^(0.044 + 0.9841 *LOG10 (final_lmax))‚Äù
BV


calc_lmat
Ny halavan‚Äôny fahamatorana dia tombanana amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny sanda voaisa avy amin‚Äôny tsanganana ‚Äòcalc_loo‚Äô, amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny raikipohy ‚Äù =(10^(0.8979 *LOG10 (calc_loo) - 0.0782))‚Äù
BV


final_lmat
Ny halavan‚Äôny farany amin‚Äôny fahamatorana (cm) mifototra amin‚Äôny kajy ao amin‚Äôny tsanganana ‚Äòcalc_lmat‚Äô boribory hatramin‚Äôny fahafolo akaiky indrindra.
BV


calc_limit_min
Kajy hamaritana ny fetra farany ambany indrindra, kajy mandeha ho azy amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny formula ‚Äú=[final_lmat]@row * 0.5‚Äù
Mandeha ho azy


length_limit_max
Fetra farany ambony indrindra (cm) ampiasaina amin‚Äôny fampitandremana sanda mifototra amin‚Äôny sanda ‚Äòfinal_lmax‚Äô, kajy mandeha ho azy amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny formula ‚Äú=[final_lmax]@row‚Äù
Mandeha ho azy


length_limit_min
Fetra farany ambany indrindra (cm) ampiasaina amin‚Äôny fampitandremana sanda mifototra amin‚Äôny sanda ‚Äòcalc_limit_min‚Äô, kajy mandeha ho Azy amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny formula‚Äù=[calc_limit_min]@row‚Äù
Mandeha ho azy


weight_limit_max
Ny fetra farany ambony indrindra (kg) ampiasaina amin‚Äôny fampitandremana ny sanda mifototra amin‚Äôny sanda ‚Äòlength_limit_max‚Äô, ‚Äòa‚Äô, ary ‚Äòb‚Äô, kajy mandeha ho azy ao Amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny raikipohy ‚Äú=(([length_limit_max]@row ^ b@row) * a@row) / 1000‚Äù
Mandeha ho azy


weight_limit_min
Ny fetra farany ambany indrindra (kg) ampiasaina amin‚Äôny fampitandremana ny sanda mifototra amin‚Äôny sanda‚Äô length_limit_min‚Äô,‚Äô a‚Äô, ary‚Äô b‚Äô, kajy mandeha ho azy ao Amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny raikipohy ‚Äú=(([length_limit_min]@row ^ b@row) * a@row) / 1000‚Äù

avg_weight
Lanja antonony (kg), kajy mandeha ho azy amin‚Äôny Smartsheet amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny formula ‚Äú=([weight_limit_max]@row + [weight_limit_min]@row) / 2‚Äù

Fanontaniana Apetraka Matetika:

Raha vao manampy admin vaovao aho, hafiriana vao miseho ao amin‚Äôny dropdown ho an‚Äôny admin2?


Haharitra 15 minitra eo ho eo vao misy fidirana vaovao ao amin‚Äôny dynamic dropdowns. Izany dia mihatra amin‚Äôny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù admin2 ao amin‚Äôny admin3_ref, ny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù vondrona karazana ao amin‚Äôny gear_ref, ny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù admin3 ao amin‚Äôny buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, sns. Jereo ny Sary 5 ho an‚Äôny lisitra feno ny f‚Äùdropdown dynamic‚Äù sy ny fizotran‚Äôny asany amin‚Äôny al√†lan‚Äôny rakitra referansa.


Raha vao manampy na manavao rakitra referansa aho, hafiriana vao miseho ny fanavaozana ao Amin‚Äôny fanadihadiana Kobo?


Tokony hahita endrika kobo nohavaozina ianao ao anatin‚Äôny 12-24 ora eo ho eo.


Ahoana no tokony hanoratana ny anaran‚Äôny mpividy, mpanjono ary mpanangona angona?


Raha ny tokony ho izy, ny anarana dia tokony ho tokana araka izay azo atao ho an‚Äôny tsirairay ary ahitana ny anarany voalohany, ny anarany farany ary ny anaram-bosotra. Raha tsy te hizara ny anarany feno ny olona iray dia azonao atao koa ny mampiasa ny litera voalohany na voalohany amin‚Äôny anarany farany.

Fifandraisana dynamic dropdown eo amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa.

title: Reference Files
text:
Ny rakitra referansa rehetra dia havaozina ao Amin‚Äôny Smartsheet Dynamic View. Ny rakitra referansa dia miasa ho toy ny fidirana ho an‚Äôny lisitra ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù amin‚Äôny endrika KoboToolbox ary misy angona izay ampiana amin‚Äôny angon-drakitra amin‚Äôny al√†lan‚Äôny fidirana. Ahitana fampahalalana feno momba ny ambaratonga ara-pitantanana ny vondrom-piarahamonina mpanjono (firenena, faritany, distrika, vohitra), toerana fiantsonana, toeram-panjonoana, mpanjono, mpividy, mpanangona antotan‚Äôisa, karazany, faritra fitantanana, karazana fitaovana ary fikambanana mpiara-miasa. Ireo dingana etsy ambany dia mamaritra ny fomba fanavaozana ireo rakitra referansa miaraka amin‚Äôny fampahalalana vaovao.
Dingana 1: Mamorona kaonty ‚Äúsmartsheet‚Äù maimaim-poana.

Azo atao ny mamorona kaonty maimaimpoana ao amin‚Äôny https://www.smartsheet.com/
Safidio ny‚ÄùTry smartsheet for free‚Äù

Dingana 2: Omeo ny Blue Ventures (BV) ny adiresy mailaka nampiasanao hamoronana ny kaontinao smartsheet.

BV dia hizara ireo rakitra fanondroana mifandraika amin‚Äôny fikambananao.
Raha te hijery ireo rakitra fanovozan-kevitra dia mila miditra amin‚Äôny Smartsheet Dynamic View ianao amin‚Äôny fampiasana ny mari-pahamantarana smartsheet anao: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Raha vao tafiditra Ao Amin‚Äôny Dynamic View (fa tsy ny fampiharana smartsheet) dia hahita lisitry ny rakitra referansa zaraina amin‚Äôny kaontinao ianao (Sary 1).

Sary 1: Lisitry ny rakitra referansa Ao Amin‚Äôny Dynamic View

Dingana 3: Tsindrio ny rakitra referansa hanaovana fanavaozana

Rehefa misokatra dia azonao atao ny manindry ny laharana tsirairay mba hanovana ny angon-drakitra efa misy, na tsindrio ny bokotra ‚ÄúVaovao‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny zoro ambony havanana raha hanampy angona vaovao (Sary 2).
Ny tontonana antsipiriany dia hiseho eo amin‚Äôny ilany havanana izay hampidiranao ny fampahalalana ilaina (Sary 3; Tabilao 1). Safidio ny‚Äù save ‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany ankavanan‚Äôny tontonana details rehefa vita ny fanavaozana.
Raha hamela fanehoan-kevitra na hametraka fanontaniana amin‚Äôny ekipan‚Äôny BV, safidio ny tabilao ‚ÄúComments‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny tontonana antsipirihany. Ireo olona rehetra izay zaraina amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa, anisan‚Äôizany ny Ekipan‚Äôny BV, dia hahazo fampandrenesana rehefa misy fanehoan-kevitra, ka tsy ilaina ny manisy marika olona manokana.

Sary 2: Ohatra fijerena momba ny admin2_ref Amin‚Äôny ‚ÄúDynamic View‚Äù

Sary 3: ohatra ny fijerena ny tontonana antsipirihany ny admin2_ref amin‚Äôny Dynamic View

Dingana 4: Famaliana ny fangatahana fanavaozana rehefa tsy hita na diso ny angona, na hamaly ny fanehoan-kevitra.

Raha misy fampahalalana tsy feno na diso izay tena ilaina amin‚Äôny fametrahana Ny ‚Äúlist dropdowns‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny Kobo na raha misy fanehoan-kevitra atao ao amin‚Äôny takelaka, dia halefa any amin‚Äôny mpampiasa voakasika rehetra ny fangatahana fanavaozana, ka manosika azy ireo hanavao ny vaovao na hamaly ny fanehoan-kevitra (Sary 4). Ny olona rehetra manana fidirana amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa dia hahazo ny fangatahana fanavaozana.
Ny fijerena mialoha ny antotan‚Äôisa mila havaozina na valiana dia hiseho eo ambanin‚Äôny hafatra mailaka, saingy tsy ho afaka hanavao ny angona mivantana amin‚Äôny mailaka ianao

Eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany amin‚Äôny mailaka, misy rohy mankany amin‚Äôny ‚ÄúGo to the sheet‚Äù; na izany aza, voafetra ny fidirana amin‚Äôny takelaka fototra. Azafady mba avereno jerena ny angon-drakitrao na valio Ny fanehoan-kevitra Amin‚Äôny Al√†lan‚Äôny ‚ÄúOpen request‚Äù.

Tsindrio ny bokotra‚Äù Open Request ‚Äù ao amin‚Äôny hafatra mailaka.
Hisokatra ny ‚Äúonglet‚Äù vaovao miaraka amin‚Äôny karazana endrika tsirairay (Sary 5)
Avereno jerena ireo saha BV ary fenoy ireo saha azo ovaina.
Tsindrio ‚Äúnext‚Äù eo amin‚Äôny farany ambany amin‚Äôny efijery mba hivezivezy amin‚Äôny fidirana tsirairay izay mila havaozina.
Mba hialana amin‚Äôny fidirana (ohatra, raha mbola tsy azonao antoka izay valiny hofidiana) tsindrio ‚ÄúNext‚Äù ka tsy manao safidy ao amin‚Äôny tsanganana azo ovaina. Hiseho ny fidirana manaraka izay mila havaozina.
Raha mila mivoaka ny pejy ianao na mijanona alohan‚Äôny hanavaozana ny fidirana rehetra dia tokony hotehirizina ny safidinao amin‚Äôny fotoana hanokafanao indray ny fangatahana. Rehefa manokatra hanohy dia tsindrio fotsiny Ny ‚ÄúNext‚Äù mandra-pahitanao fidirana mila havaozina.
Rehefa tonga amin‚Äôny fidirana farany ianao dia tsindrio ‚ÄúDone‚Äù. Hisy hafatra mipoitra hanontany raha Toa ianao ka ‚ÄòVonona ny handefa ny fanavaozanao?‚Äô:

Tsindrio ‚ÄúGo Back‚Äù raha mila hanamarina ianao
Kitiho ny ‚ÄúSubmit Update‚Äù mba handefasana ny fanavaozanao.
Ny fanavaozanao dia ampidirina ho azy amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa ary azonao jerena ao amin‚Äôny Dynamic View


Sary 4: Ohatra ‚ÄúUpdate Request‚Äù mailaka rehefa mila ahitsy ny fampahalalana na mila valiana ny fanehoan-kevitra.

Tabilao 1: ny saha voalohany ao amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa tsirairay. Ny karazana saha ‚ÄúBV‚Äù dia tantanan‚Äôny Blue Ventures ary tsy azo ovaina. Mba hangataka fanovana amin‚Äôny iray amin‚Äôireo saha ‚ÄúBV‚Äù, azafady avelao ny fanehoan-kevitra. Ny saha misy karazana saha ‚Äúazo ovaina‚Äù ihany no azo ovaina. Ny karazana saha ‚Äúauto‚Äù dia mipetraka ho azy.

Fanontaniana Apetraka Matetika:

Raha vao manampy admin vaovao aho, hafiriana vao miseho ao amin‚Äôny dropdown ho an‚Äôny admin2?


Haharitra 15 minitra eo ho eo vao misy fidirana vaovao ao amin‚Äôny dynamic dropdowns. Izany dia mihatra amin‚Äôny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù admin2 ao amin‚Äôny admin3_ref, ny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù vondrona karazana ao amin‚Äôny gear_ref, ny ‚Äúdropdown‚Äù admin3 ao amin‚Äôny buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, sns. Jereo ny Sary 5 ho an‚Äôny lisitra feno ny f‚Äùdropdown dynamic‚Äù sy ny fizotran‚Äôny asany amin‚Äôny al√†lan‚Äôny rakitra referansa.


Raha vao manampy na manavao rakitra referansa aho, hafiriana vao miseho ny fanavaozana ao Amin‚Äôny fanadihadiana Kobo?


Tokony hahita endrika kobo nohavaozina ianao ao anatin‚Äôny 12-24 ora eo ho eo.


Ahoana no tokony hanoratana ny anaran‚Äôny mpividy, mpanjono ary mpanangona angona?


Raha ny tokony ho izy, ny anarana dia tokony ho tokana araka izay azo atao ho an‚Äôny tsirairay ary ahitana ny anarany voalohany, ny anarany farany ary ny anaram-bosotra. Raha tsy te hizara ny anarany feno ny olona iray dia azonao atao koa ny mampiasa ny litera voalohany na voalohany amin‚Äôny anarany farany.

Fifandraisana dynamic dropdown eo amin‚Äôny rakitra referansa.

title: Fichiers de r√©f√©rence
text:
Tous les fichiers de r√©f√©rence sont mis √† jour dans la vue dynamique Smartsheet. Les fichiers de r√©f√©rence servent d‚Äôentr√©es pour les listes d√©roulantes dans les formulaires KoboToolbox et contiennent des donn√©es qui sont ajout√©es aux ensembles de donn√©es ma√Ætres via des jointures. Ils contiennent des informations compl√®tes sur les niveaux administratifs des communaut√©s de p√™cheurs( pays, province, district, village), les sites de d√©barquement, les lieux de p√™che, les p√™cheurs, les acheteurs, les collecteurs de donn√©es, les esp√®ces, les zones de gestion, les types d‚Äôengins et les organisations partenaires. Les √©tapes ci-dessous d√©crivent comment mettre √† jour les fichiers de r√©f√©rence avec de nouvelles informations.
√âtape 1: Cr√©ez un compte smartsheet gratuit.

Un compte gratuit peut √™tre cr√©√© √† https://www.smartsheet.com/
S√©lectionnez ‚Äù Essayez smartsheet gratuitement‚Äù

√âtape 2: Fournissez √† Blue Ventures (BV) l‚Äôadresse e-mail que vous avez utilis√©e pour cr√©er votre compte Smartsheet.

BV partagera ensuite les fichiers de r√©f√©rence associ√©s √† votre organisation.
Pour afficher vos fichiers de r√©f√©rence, vous devez vous connecter √† la vue dynamique Smartsheet √† l‚Äôaide de vos informations d‚Äôidentification Smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Une fois connect√© √† la vue dynamique (et non √† l‚Äôapplication smartsheet), vous verrez une liste de fichiers de r√©f√©rence partag√©s avec votre compte (figure 1).

Figure 1: Liste des fichiers de r√©f√©rence en vue dynamique

√âtape 3: Cliquez sur un fichier de r√©f√©rence pour effectuer des mises √† jour

Une fois ouvert, vous pouvez cliquer sur chaque ligne pour apporter des modifications aux donn√©es existantes, ou cliquer sur le bouton‚Äù Nouveau ‚Äù dans le coin sup√©rieur droit pour ajouter de nouvelles donn√©es (Figure 2).
Un panneau de d√©tails appara√Ætra sur le c√¥t√© droit o√π vous saisirez les informations n√©cessaires (Figure 3; Tableau 1). S√©lectionnez ‚Äù enregistrer‚Äù en bas √† droite du panneau de d√©tails lorsque vous avez termin√© la mise √† jour.
Pour laisser un commentaire ou poser des questions √† l‚Äô√©quipe de BV, s√©lectionnez l‚Äôonglet ‚ÄúCommentaires‚Äù dans le panneau des d√©tails. Toutes les personnes avec lesquelles le fichier de r√©f√©rence est partag√©, y compris l‚Äô√©quipe BV, recevront une notification lorsqu‚Äôun commentaire est fait, il n‚Äôest donc pas n√©cessaire de marquer une personne en particulier.

Figure 2: Exemple de vue de l‚Äôadmin2_ref en vue dynamique

Figure 3: Exemple de vue du panneau de d√©tails admin2_ref en vue dynamique

√âtape 4: R√©pondre aux demandes de mise √† jour lorsque des donn√©es sont manquantes ou incorrectes, ou pour r√©pondre √† un commentaire.

Si des informations incompl√®tes ou incorrectes sont essentielles pour remplir les listes d√©roulantes Kobo ou pour les jointures, ou si un commentaire est fait dans la feuille, une demande de mise √† jour sera envoy√©e √† tous les utilisateurs appropri√©s, les invitant √† mettre √† jour les informations ou √† r√©pondre √† un commentaire (figure 4). Par d√©faut, toutes les personnes ayant acc√®s √† vos fichiers de r√©f√©rence recevront la demande de mise √† jour.
Un aper√ßu des donn√©es qui doivent √™tre mises √† jour ou auxquelles il faut r√©pondre appara√Ætra sous l‚Äôe-mail, mais vous ne pourrez pas mettre √† jour les donn√©es directement dans l‚Äôe-mail

Au bas de l‚Äôe-mail, il y a un lien pour ‚ÄúAller √† la feuille‚Äù; cependant, la feuille sous-jacente a un acc√®s restreint. Veuillez consulter vos donn√©es ou r√©pondre au commentaire via une demande ouverte.

Cliquez sur le bouton‚Äù Ouvrir la demande ‚Äù dans le message √©lectronique.
Une nouvelle fen√™tre de navigateur Internet s‚Äôouvrira avec une configuration de type formulaire pour chaque entr√©e (Figure 5)
R√©visez les colonnes BV et compl√©tez les colonnes modifiables.
Cliquez sur Suivant en bas de l‚Äô√©cran pour parcourir chaque entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour.
Pour ignorer une entr√©e (par exemple, si vous ne savez pas encore quelle r√©ponse choisir), cliquez sur ‚ÄúSuivant‚Äù sans effectuer de s√©lection dans les colonnes modifiables. La prochaine entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour appara√Ætra.
Si vous devez quitter la page ou vous arr√™ter avant que toutes les entr√©es aient √©t√© mises √† jour, vos choix doivent √™tre enregistr√©s la prochaine fois que vous rouvrirez la demande. Lors de l‚Äôouverture pour continuer, cliquez simplement sur ‚ÄúSuivant‚Äù jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous trouviez une entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour.
Lorsque vous arrivez √† la derni√®re entr√©e, cliquez sur ‚ÄúTermin√©‚Äù. Un message contextuel appara√Ætra vous demandant si vous √™tes pr√™t √† soumettre votre mise √† jour?‚Äô:

Cliquez sur‚Äù Revenir en arri√®re ‚Äù si vous avez besoin de revoir
Cliquez sur ‚ÄúSoumettre la mise √† jour‚Äù pour soumettre vos mises √† jour.
Vos mises √† jour sont automatiquement ajout√©es au fichier de r√©f√©rence et vous pouvez les afficher en mode dynamique


Figure 4: Exemple d‚Äôe-mail de‚Äù Demande de mise √† jour ‚Äù lorsque des informations doivent √™tre corrig√©es ou qu‚Äôun commentaire doit recevoir une r√©ponse.

Tableau 1¬†: Les colonnes principales de chacun des fichiers de r√©f√©rence. Le type de colonne ¬´¬†BV¬†¬ª est g√©r√© par Blue Ventures et n‚Äôest pas modifiable. Pour demander des modifications √† l‚Äôune des colonnes ¬´¬†BV¬†¬ª, veuillez laisser un commentaire. Seules les colonnes de type ¬´¬†modifiable¬†¬ª peuvent √™tre modifi√©es. Le type de colonne ¬´¬†auto¬†¬ª est renseign√© automatiquement.

Questions Fr√©quemment Pos√©es:

Une fois que j‚Äôai ajout√© un nouvel admin1, combien de temps faut-il avant qu‚Äôil n‚Äôapparaisse dans la liste d√©roulante pour admin2?


Il faudra environ 15 minutes avant que de nouvelles entr√©es soient disponibles dans les listes d√©roulantes dynamiques. Cela s‚Äôapplique √† la liste d√©roulante admin2 dans admin3_ref, √† la liste d√©roulante species_group dans gear_ref, √† la liste d√©roulante admin3 dans buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, etc. Voir la figure 5 pour la liste compl√®te des listes d√©roulantes dynamiques et leur flux de travail dans les fichiers de r√©f√©rence.


Une fois que j‚Äôai ajout√© ou mis √† jour un fichier de r√©f√©rence, combien de temps faut-il avant que les mises √† jour apparaissent dans les enqu√™tes Kobo?


Vous devriez voir un formulaire Kobo mis √† jour dans environ 12 √† 24 heures.


Comment les noms des acheteurs, des p√™cheurs et des collecteurs de donn√©es devraient-ils √™tre enregistr√©s?


Id√©alement, les noms devraient √™tre aussi uniques que possible pour l‚Äôindividu et inclure son pr√©nom, son nom de famille et son surnom. Si une personne ne souhaite pas partager son nom de famille complet, vous pouvez √©galement utiliser la premi√®re initiale ou la premi√®re lettre de son nom de famille.

Connexion d√©roulante dynamique entre les fichiers de r√©f√©rence.

title: Fichiers de r√©f√©rence
text:
Tous les fichiers de r√©f√©rence sont mis √† jour dans la vue dynamique Smartsheet. Les fichiers de r√©f√©rence servent d‚Äôentr√©es pour les listes d√©roulantes dans les formulaires KoboToolbox et contiennent des donn√©es qui sont ajout√©es aux ensembles de donn√©es ma√Ætres via des jointures. Ils contiennent des informations compl√®tes sur les niveaux administratifs des communaut√©s de p√™cheurs( pays, province, district, village), les sites de d√©barquement, les lieux de p√™che, les p√™cheurs, les acheteurs, les collecteurs de donn√©es, les esp√®ces, les zones de gestion, les types d‚Äôengins et les organisations partenaires. Les √©tapes ci-dessous d√©crivent comment mettre √† jour les fichiers de r√©f√©rence avec de nouvelles informations.
√âtape 1: Cr√©ez un compte smartsheet gratuit.

Un compte gratuit peut √™tre cr√©√© √† https://www.smartsheet.com/
S√©lectionnez ‚Äù Essayez smartsheet gratuitement‚Äù

√âtape 2: Fournissez √† Blue Ventures (BV) l‚Äôadresse e-mail que vous avez utilis√©e pour cr√©er votre compte Smartsheet.

BV partagera ensuite les fichiers de r√©f√©rence associ√©s √† votre organisation.
Pour afficher vos fichiers de r√©f√©rence, vous devez vous connecter √† la vue dynamique Smartsheet √† l‚Äôaide de vos informations d‚Äôidentification Smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Une fois connect√© √† la vue dynamique (et non √† l‚Äôapplication smartsheet), vous verrez une liste de fichiers de r√©f√©rence partag√©s avec votre compte (figure 1).

Figure 1: Liste des fichiers de r√©f√©rence en vue dynamique

√âtape 3: Cliquez sur un fichier de r√©f√©rence pour effectuer des mises √† jour

Une fois ouvert, vous pouvez cliquer sur chaque ligne pour apporter des modifications aux donn√©es existantes, ou cliquer sur le bouton‚Äù Nouveau ‚Äù dans le coin sup√©rieur droit pour ajouter de nouvelles donn√©es (Figure 2).
Un panneau de d√©tails appara√Ætra sur le c√¥t√© droit o√π vous saisirez les informations n√©cessaires (Figure 3; Tableau 1). S√©lectionnez ‚Äù enregistrer‚Äù en bas √† droite du panneau de d√©tails lorsque vous avez termin√© la mise √† jour.
Pour laisser un commentaire ou poser des questions √† l‚Äô√©quipe de BV, s√©lectionnez l‚Äôonglet ‚ÄúCommentaires‚Äù dans le panneau des d√©tails. Toutes les personnes avec lesquelles le fichier de r√©f√©rence est partag√©, y compris l‚Äô√©quipe BV, recevront une notification lorsqu‚Äôun commentaire est fait, il n‚Äôest donc pas n√©cessaire de marquer une personne en particulier.

Figure 2: Exemple de vue de l‚Äôadmin2_ref en vue dynamique

Figure 3: Exemple de vue du panneau de d√©tails admin2_ref en vue dynamique

√âtape 4: R√©pondre aux demandes de mise √† jour lorsque des donn√©es sont manquantes ou incorrectes, ou pour r√©pondre √† un commentaire.

Si des informations incompl√®tes ou incorrectes sont essentielles pour remplir les listes d√©roulantes Kobo ou pour les jointures, ou si un commentaire est fait dans la feuille, une demande de mise √† jour sera envoy√©e √† tous les utilisateurs appropri√©s, les invitant √† mettre √† jour les informations ou √† r√©pondre √† un commentaire (figure 4). Par d√©faut, toutes les personnes ayant acc√®s √† vos fichiers de r√©f√©rence recevront la demande de mise √† jour.
Un aper√ßu des donn√©es qui doivent √™tre mises √† jour ou auxquelles il faut r√©pondre appara√Ætra sous l‚Äôe-mail, mais vous ne pourrez pas mettre √† jour les donn√©es directement dans l‚Äôe-mail

Au bas de l‚Äôe-mail, il y a un lien pour ‚ÄúAller √† la feuille‚Äù; cependant, la feuille sous-jacente a un acc√®s restreint. Veuillez consulter vos donn√©es ou r√©pondre au commentaire via une demande ouverte.

Cliquez sur le bouton‚Äù Ouvrir la demande ‚Äù dans le message √©lectronique.
Une nouvelle fen√™tre de navigateur Internet s‚Äôouvrira avec une configuration de type formulaire pour chaque entr√©e (Figure 5)
R√©visez les colonnes BV et compl√©tez les colonnes modifiables.
Cliquez sur Suivant en bas de l‚Äô√©cran pour parcourir chaque entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour.
Pour ignorer une entr√©e (par exemple, si vous ne savez pas encore quelle r√©ponse choisir), cliquez sur ‚ÄúSuivant‚Äù sans effectuer de s√©lection dans les colonnes modifiables. La prochaine entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour appara√Ætra.
Si vous devez quitter la page ou vous arr√™ter avant que toutes les entr√©es aient √©t√© mises √† jour, vos choix doivent √™tre enregistr√©s la prochaine fois que vous rouvrirez la demande. Lors de l‚Äôouverture pour continuer, cliquez simplement sur ‚ÄúSuivant‚Äù jusqu‚Äô√† ce que vous trouviez une entr√©e qui doit √™tre mise √† jour.
Lorsque vous arrivez √† la derni√®re entr√©e, cliquez sur ‚ÄúTermin√©‚Äù. Un message contextuel appara√Ætra vous demandant si vous √™tes pr√™t √† soumettre votre mise √† jour?‚Äô:

Cliquez sur‚Äù Revenir en arri√®re ‚Äù si vous avez besoin de revoir
Cliquez sur ‚ÄúSoumettre la mise √† jour‚Äù pour soumettre vos mises √† jour.
Vos mises √† jour sont automatiquement ajout√©es au fichier de r√©f√©rence et vous pouvez les afficher en mode dynamique


Figure 4: Exemple d‚Äôe-mail de‚Äù Demande de mise √† jour ‚Äù lorsque des informations doivent √™tre corrig√©es ou qu‚Äôun commentaire doit recevoir une r√©ponse.

Pour demander des modifications √† l‚Äôune des colonnes ¬´¬†BV¬†¬ª, veuillez laisser un commentaire. Seules les colonnes de type ¬´¬†modifiable¬†¬ª peuvent √™tre modifi√©es. Questions Fr√©quemment Pos√©es:

Une fois que j‚Äôai ajout√© un nouvel admin1, combien de temps faut-il avant qu‚Äôil n‚Äôapparaisse dans la liste d√©roulante pour admin2?


Il faudra environ 15 minutes avant que de nouvelles entr√©es soient disponibles dans les listes d√©roulantes dynamiques. Cela s‚Äôapplique √† la liste d√©roulante admin2 dans admin3_ref, √† la liste d√©roulante species_group dans gear_ref, √† la liste d√©roulante admin3 dans buyer_ref, fisher_ref, data_collector, etc. Voir la figure 5 pour la liste compl√®te des listes d√©roulantes dynamiques et leur flux de travail dans les fichiers de r√©f√©rence.


Une fois que j‚Äôai ajout√© ou mis √† jour un fichier de r√©f√©rence, combien de temps faut-il avant que les mises √† jour apparaissent dans les enqu√™tes Kobo?


Vous devriez voir un formulaire Kobo mis √† jour dans environ 12 √† 24 heures.


Comment les noms des acheteurs, des p√™cheurs et des collecteurs de donn√©es devraient-ils √™tre enregistr√©s?


Id√©alement, les noms devraient √™tre aussi uniques que possible pour l‚Äôindividu et inclure son pr√©nom, son nom de famille et son surnom. Si une personne ne souhaite pas partager son nom de famille complet, vous pouvez √©galement utiliser la premi√®re initiale ou la premi√®re lettre de son nom de famille.

Connexion d√©roulante dynamique entre les fichiers de r√©f√©rence.

title: Archivos de referencia
text:
Todos los archivos de referencia se actualizan en la vista din√°mica de Smartsheet. Los archivos de referencia sirven como entradas para las listas desplegables en los formularios de KoBoToolbox y contienen datos que se agregan a los conjuntos de datos maestros a trav√©s de uniones. Contienen informaci√≥n completa sobre los niveles administrativos de las comunidades pesqueras (pa√≠s, provincia, distrito, aldea), sitios de desembarque, caladeros, pescadores, compradores, recolectores de datos, especies, √°reas de manejo, tipos de artes y organizaciones asociadas. Los pasos a continuaci√≥n describen c√≥mo actualizar los archivos de referencia con nueva informaci√≥n.
Paso 1: Cree una cuenta gratuita de smartsheet.

Se puede crear una cuenta gratuita en https://www.smartsheet.com/
Seleccione ‚ÄúPruebe smartsheet de forma gratuita‚Äù.

Paso 2: Proporcione a Blue Ventures (BV) la direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico que utiliz√≥ para crear su cuenta de smartsheet.

BV luego compartir√° los archivos de referencia asociados con su organizaci√≥n.
Para ver sus archivos de referencia, deber√° iniciar sesi√≥n en la vista din√°mica de smartsheet con sus credenciales de smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Una vez que inicie sesi√≥n en la Vista din√°mica (no en la aplicaci√≥n de smartsheet), ver√° una lista de archivos de referencia compartidos con su cuenta (Figura 1).

Figura 1: Lista de archivos de referencia en la vista din√°mica

Paso 3: Haga clic en un archivo de referencia para realizar actualizaciones

Una vez abierto, puede hacer clic en cada fila para realizar ediciones en los datos existentes, o hacer clic en el bot√≥n ‚ÄúNuevo‚Äù en la esquina superior derecha para agregar nuevos datos (Figura 2).
Aparecer√° un panel de detalles en el lado derecho donde ingresar√° la informaci√≥n necesaria (Figura 3; Tabla 1). Seleccione ‚Äúguardar‚Äù en la parte inferior derecha del panel de detalles cuando haya terminado de actualizar.
Para dejar un comentario o hacer cualquier pregunta al equipo de BV, seleccione la pesta√±a ‚ÄúComentarios‚Äù en el panel de detalles. Todas las personas con las que se comparte el archivo de referencia, incluido el equipo de BV, recibir√°n una notificaci√≥n cuando se haga un comentario, por lo que no es necesario etiquetar a ninguna persona en particular.

Figura 2: Vista de ejemplo de admin2_ref en Vista din√°mica

Figura 3: Vista de ejemplo del panel de detalles admin2_ref en la Vista din√°mica

Paso 4: Responda a las solicitudes de actualizaci√≥n cuando falten datos o sean incorrectos, o para responder a un comentario.

Si hay informaci√≥n incompleta o incorrecta que es esencial para completar los men√∫s desplegables de Kobo o para unirse, o si se hace un comentario en la hoja, se enviar√° una solicitud de actualizaci√≥n a todos los usuarios apropiados, pidi√©ndoles que actualicen la informaci√≥n o respondan a un comentario (Figura 4). De forma predeterminada, todas las personas con acceso a sus archivos de referencia recibir√°n la solicitud de actualizaci√≥n.
Aparecer√° una vista previa de los datos que deben actualizarse o responderse debajo del mensaje de correo electr√≥nico, pero no podr√° actualizar ning√∫n dato directamente en el correo electr√≥nico

En la parte inferior del correo electr√≥nico, hay un enlace para ‚ÄúIr a la hoja‚Äù; sin embargo, la hoja subyacente tiene acceso restringido. Revise sus datos o responda al comentario a trav√©s de una solicitud abierta.

Haga clic en el bot√≥n‚Äù Abrir solicitud ‚Äù en el mensaje de correo electr√≥nico.
Se abrir√° una nueva ventana del navegador de Internet con una configuraci√≥n similar a un formulario para cada entrada (Figura 5)
Revise las columnas de BV y rellene las columnas editables.
Haga clic en siguiente en la parte inferior de la pantalla para desplazarse por cada entrada que deba actualizarse.
Para omitir una entrada (por ejemplo, si a√∫n no est√° seguro de qu√© respuesta elegir), haga clic en ‚ÄúSiguiente‚Äù sin hacer una selecci√≥n en las columnas editables. Aparecer√° la siguiente entrada que necesita actualizarse.
Si necesita salir de la p√°gina o detenerse antes de que se hayan actualizado todas las entradas, sus opciones deben guardarse la pr√≥xima vez que vuelva a abrir la solicitud. Al abrir para continuar, simplemente haga clic en ‚ÄúSiguiente‚Äù hasta que encuentre una entrada que deba actualizarse.
Cuando llegue a la √∫ltima entrada, haga clic en ‚ÄúListo‚Äù. Aparecer√° un mensaje emergente que le preguntar√° si est√° listo para enviar su actualizaci√≥n.‚Äô:

Haga clic en ‚ÄúVolver‚Äù si necesita revisar
Haga clic en‚Äù Enviar actualizaci√≥n ‚Äù para enviar sus actualizaciones.
Sus actualizaciones se agregan autom√°ticamente al archivo de referencia y puede verlas en la Vista din√°mica


Figura 4: Ejemplo de correo electr√≥nico de ‚ÄúSolicitud de actualizaci√≥n‚Äù cuando es necesario corregir la informaci√≥n o responder a los comentarios.

Tabla 1: Las columnas principales de cada uno de los archivos de referencia. El tipo de columna ‚ÄúBV‚Äù lo administra Blue Ventures y no se puede editar. Para solicitar cambios en cualquiera de las columnas ‚ÄúBV‚Äù, deje un comentario. Solo se pueden editar las columnas con el tipo ‚Äúeditable‚Äù. El tipo de columna ‚Äúauto‚Äù se completa autom√°ticamente.

Aparecer√° el panel de detalles, como en la Figura 3. Haga clic en la pesta√±a‚Äù Comentarios ‚Äù para ver todos los comentarios de esa fila.
