title: Management Ref
text:
Purpose:
The management_ref in Smartsheet is used to track all BV-supported areas under management. Specifically, it documents the following core information:

The names of management units and their zones.
The area (ha) of each management unit and zone.
The communities involved in governance.
The communities that fish, harvest, or recreate in these areas.
The dates each management method was established, and the zones they apply to.
The species and habitats the management methods apply to.

Management Unit & Management Zones:
A management unit refers to a large-scale designated area under a specific management framework. It is typically defined based on ecological, administrative, or jurisdictional boundaries.

It encompasses multiple zones that may have different regulations or uses.
It can be an entire marine protected area (MPA), a fishery management region, or a broader coastal area under a governance plan.
Example: A national marine sanctuary or a community-managed fishing area.

A management zone is a subdivision within a management unit that has specific rules, uses, or restrictions based on conservation goals, resource use, or habitat protection.

Zones are created to allow different activities while ensuring sustainable management.
Common zone types include:

No-take zones (where fishing and harvesting are prohibited)
General use zone (where regulated fishing, tourism, and recreation are allowed)
Harvesting ban zone (where harvesting a particular species may be prohibited, but fishing otherwise is allowed)
Seasonal or temporary closure zones (restricted access during breeding or spawning seasons)

Example: Within a marine protected area or community-managed area, one zone may allow traditional fishing while another prohibits all extractive activities to protect coral reefs.

It is important to mention that some areas may not yet be part of a larger management unit and may exist as stand-alone zones, such as no-take zones. In many cases, this serves as a first step toward establishing a broader community-managed area. However, our larger goal at Blue Ventures should be to develop comprehensive community-managed areas that encompass these zones. For data entry purposes, if a formal management unit does not yet exist, you can assign a temporary name until one is officially established. The management zone name should reflect the specific zone‚Äôs name.
Data Entry:

For visual examples for entering data, please refer to these slides.
The unit_name is the name of the management unit. If unit_name is left blank, this row will not be counted towards the total area under management during ‚Äúreach‚Äù reporting. Please remember to always assign a management unit name to the zone, and remember:¬†

If a formal management unit does not yet exist, you can assign a temporary name until one is officially established. The management zone name should reflect the specific zone‚Äôs name.

The management_name represents the name of the zone within the management unit. See Figure 2 for a full description of column names.¬†
The management_method selected should apply to the spatial area of the management zone (management_name). If a management method applies to the entire management unit, the unit_name and management_name should be the same. For example, if a management unit has a deforestation ban across the entire area, including within the small no take zone in the management unit, then the data should look like this:

unit_name= Ambalahonko, management_name=Ambalahonko, management_method= Deforestation ban
unit_name= Ambalahonko, management_name=Ambalahonko No Take, management_method= No Take Zone

The management_area_ha should be the area associated with the zone (management_name). If the unit_name and management_name are the same, as in the above example where the management methods apply to the entire management unit, then the area reported should be the entire area of the management unit, seeing as it‚Äôs also the name of the zone where the management methods apply. This is important as the way the area is entered impacts how we calculate total area associated with each management unit.¬†

There are two ways in which the total area of each management unit is calculated:

The area associated with each unique zone within the management unit will be summed to acquire the total area of the management unit.

For temporary closures, only the area associated with the most recent closure event will be used (i.e.¬†if Brittany TC occurred 10-1-2025 to 12/1/2025 and was 25 ha, and then Brittany TC was closed again 3/1/2026-5/1/2026 and was 50ha in a slightly different location, then we would use the most recent closure event area of 50ha).

If the management unit name and the zone name are the same, implying the management_methods associated with this row apply to the entire management unit, then we assume the area (and management methods) associated with this row apply to the entire management unit, and in this case, we use the area associated with this row, rather than summing all unique zones within the unit to avoid overlap/over-estimating area.


There are several scenarios in which there should be multiple rows associated with a single zone or management_name (see Figure 1 for specific examples).¬†

When there are multiple management methods in place within the zone, as we want to track the date each method was implemented (est_date), so each method needs to have it‚Äôs own row;¬†
When a management method covers a new species or habitat;
When a temporary closure has new open/close dates.


Examples of Specific Data Entry Issues:

There are several records where management_method=other. Please define what those are, and attempt to fit them into one of the predefined options for management_method.
There are several temporary closures with the same management_name, same open and close dates, yet different lat/longs and different management_area_ha. This implies that a single temporary closure was located in several different places of different sizes (areas) all at the same time. Please identify whether these rows are duplicates (i.e.¬†area and lat/longs are wrong for two of the rows because they were inputted incorrectly), in which case they should be removed, if these are actually spatially explicit areas that need to be distinctly named. See example below:

The only possible way a single spatial area could have different areas and lat/longs from one another, is if each row was meant to represent a different closure event, in which case the open and close dates should be different than other rows. For instance, if Brittany TC was opened 10/1/2025 and closed 12/1/2025 and was 25 ha, but the next closure event for Brittany TC was in a slightly different location and size to reflect adaptive management, then this makes sense, and Brittany TC could indeed have different lat/longs and area.¬†
If these are spatially explicit areas that opened and closed at the same time in different areas, these closures should be distinctly named, perhaps one called Brittany TC 1 and another Brittany TC 2.


Connecting Management Ref to Spatial Boundaries

The management_name will be used to link the management_ref to the spatial boundaries associated with that zone.
Spatial boundaries are used to validate the area that is reported for each zone in the management_ref.
Spatial boundaries will be displayed in an interactive dashboard (coming soon), with the management_ref data joined to it so that all data documented in the management_ref can be visually displayed and explored in a map. Users will be able to see which management methods apply to each zone in the map, as well as dates they were established, and total area.
To share spatial boundaries with the Spatial and Ecological Team so that they can be displayed in the dashboard and used to validate area numbers, please upload to this google form. Data uploaded via this form is sent to our central landing area (shared google drive called ‚ÄúSpatial Data‚Äù) and saved in a standardized naming convention. The data is validated/checked here for naming and geometry issues before being sent to the central database (postgresql/postgis) and subsequently uploaded to the dashboard. Uploading boundaries to this google form allows our team to process data in a standardized way.¬†

We want to avoid uploading directly to the Spatial Data shared drive, as we want to ensure consistent naming conventions, which our google form generates, and we do not receive email notifications when uploaded directly to the drive (only when uploaded to google form).¬†
If you decide to upload directly to the shared drive/if someone on your team is GIS-savvy, please upload to the appropriate nested folder. The file structure is Management Units/Country/archive or final. 1) Data that has not been processed to fit our shapefile naming convention (raw data) should be shared to the Management Units/Country/archive folder. Once uploaded, let our team know the data has been uploaded and is ready for processing. 2) If your team is GIS-savvy and would prefer to process the shapefile on their own, please first upload raw data to the archive folder, and then ensure the processed shapefile follows these specifications:

Shapefile name: iso3code_mgmt_monthyear_projection.shp (e.g.¬†ken_mgmt_jan2025_wgs84.shp)
Attribute table naming convention:

mgmt_name = management_name from management_ref
mgmt_ha = area in hectares
iso3 = the 3 letter code for the country

Upload or append data to Management Units/Country/final folder
Notify Spatial and Ecological Team that data has been processed and needs to be incorporated into the global dataset (appended to Management Units/Country/final/ bv_global_mgmt_jan2025_wgs84.shp) and subsequently saved to the postgresql/postgis database.


How to access/download spatial boundaries:

Final management boundaries will be saved to the Spatial Data shared drive in the following pathway: H:\Shared drives\Spatial Data\Management Units\Global\final. Data can be downloaded from here for now, but once the dashboard to visualize the data is complete, the data will be available for download, and pulled directly from our postgresql/postgis database, which will be the final validated dataset.


Figure 1: Example of how to enter data in management_ref. Rows that are colored the same are associated with the same spatial area, indicated by having the same management_name.The highlighted text shows why the new row is justified according to the assumptions above.

Figure 2: Management_ref column descriptions.



country
ISO country code, which is an internationally recognized letter combination code
BV


unit_name
The name of the management unit that the management_name is associated with.
editable


management_name
Unique name of the management area with spaces and punctuation allowed. This should be the name of the spatial zone in which management methods apply. There should be at least one row of data where the unit_name and management_name are the same, as this represents the methods within the larger management unit.
editable


management_method
The type of management method that applies to the management_name. The predefined list includes: General Use, Temporary Closure, Seasonal Closure, No Take Zone, Gear Restriction, Managed Access, Harvesting Ban, Size Restriction, Habitat Protection, or Deforestation Ban.
editable


est_date
Date the management method was established/when the management method began applying to new species or habitat; MM/DD/YY
(this does not apply to temporary closures)
editable


close_date
Closing date of the managed area; MM/DD/YY
(this applies to temporary closures only)
editable


open_date
Opening date of the managed area; MM/DD/YY
(this applies to temporary closures only)
editable


mangrove_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for mangroves has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


seagrass_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for seagrass has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


reef_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for reefs has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


mgmt_body
The official governing body of the management_name
editable


regulation_type
The type of legal regulation. The predefined list includes: village head regulation, village head decree, joint village head regulation or none.
editable


admin3_fish
The list of admin3s that fish, harvest or recreate within the management_name.
editable


admin3_fish_flag
The flag will be red if one of the admin3s listed in the ‚Äúadmin3_fish‚Äù column does not exist in the admin3_ref.
BV


admin3_govern
The list of admin3s that have a role in governing the management_name.
editable


admin3_govern_flag
The flag will be red if one of the admin3s listed in the ‚Äúadmin3_govern‚Äù column does not exist in the admin3_ref.
BV


management_fishing_ground
The list of fishing grounds associated with the management_name. The dropdown list is connected to the ‚Äúname‚Äù column in the fishing_ground_ref.
editable


fishing_ground_flag
The flag will be red if one of the fishing grounds listed in ‚Äúmanagement_fishing_ground‚Äù does not exist in the fishing_ground_ref.
BV


target_group
Target species group for the management_method. This can include ‚ÄòAll‚Äô, one or multiple species groups. The dropdown list is connected to the MASTER species_ref and includes species groups from all partners.
editable


target_species
Target species for the management_method. This can include ‚ÄòAll_species‚Äô, one or multiple scientific species. The dropdown list is connected to the MASTER species_ref and includes species from all partners.
editable


species_flag
The flag will be red if the ‚Äútarget_species‚Äù chosen is not referenced in the partner‚Äôs species_ref.
BV


target_habitat
Target habitat for the management_method. The predefined dropdown list includes the habitat choices: reef, seagrass, mangrove, mud_flat, sand, deepwater or other.
editable


management_area_ha
Size of the management_name in hectares (ha). Keep in mind this is the area of the management_name or zone ONLY. All management_names associated with a management_unit will be totaled to generate a total area for the management unit (unit_name). Only the most recent temporary closure area will be included.
editable


management_lat
Latitude of management_name
editable


management_long
Longitude of management_name
editable


partner_ID
Partner name with no spaces and no punctuation, only underscores. The dropdown list is connected to the ‚Äúname‚Äù column in the org_ref.
editable


partner_flag
The flag will be red if the ‚Äúpartner‚Äù value does not exist in the org_ref
BV


spatial_data
Indicates if the management_name has a match in the shapefile attribute table. If you‚Äôd like to submit any new spatial boundaries (management areas, habitat, communities, etc), upload the spatial files to this form. The management_name will be used to link spatial data to the management_ref, so any spatial boundaries that are sent should include the management_name in the attribute table of the shapefile.
BV


bv_started_work
The formula in this column brings in the most recent date from the start_date column in the admin3_ref, based on the communities listed in the admin3_fish column in the management_ref.
BV


bv_stopped_work
The formula in this column brings in the most recent end_date from admin3_ref only if every community in the admin3_fish column in management_ref has a corresponding end_date in admin3_ref. In other words, if three admin3_fish communities are associated with a management area, and one community has an end date in the admin3_ref, the bv_stop_date will remain blank in the management_ref because two communities are still active. A date will only appear in the bv_stop_date column if all admin3_fish communities have an end_date in the admin3_ref.
BV


raw_data_id
Unique ID to be able to join Smartsheet records to archived Airtables
BV


airtable_closure_ref
Unique ID assigned to closures in Airtable
BV


airtable_notes
Notes brought over from Airtable to assist in updating/correcting data in Smartsheet management_ref
BV


management_unique
Concatenation of lmma_id + lmma_name + management_id + management_name + open_date + close_date +est_date ¬†to identify unique Temporary Closure events and management methods within management areas
BV

iso3 = the 3 letter code for the country

Upload or append data to Management Units/Country/final folder
Notify Spatial and Ecological Team that data has been processed and needs to be incorporated into the global dataset (appended to Management Units/Country/final/ bv_global_mgmt_jan2025_wgs84.shp) and subsequently saved to the postgresql/postgis database.


How to access/download spatial boundaries:

Final management boundaries will be saved to the Spatial Data shared drive in the following pathway: H:\Shared drives\Spatial Data\Management Units\Global\final. Data can be downloaded from here for now, but once the dashboard to visualize the data is complete, the data will be available for download, and pulled directly from our postgresql/postgis database, which will be the final validated dataset.


Figure 1: Example of how to enter data in management_ref. Rows that are colored the same are associated with the same spatial area, indicated by having the same management_name.The highlighted text shows why the new row is justified according to the assumptions above.

Figure 2: Management_ref column descriptions.



country
ISO country code, which is an internationally recognized letter combination code
BV


unit_name
The name of the management unit that the management_name is associated with.
editable


management_name
Unique name of the management area with spaces and punctuation allowed. This should be the name of the spatial zone in which management methods apply. There should be at least one row of data where the unit_name and management_name are the same, as this represents the methods within the larger management unit.
editable


management_method
The type of management method that applies to the management_name. The predefined list includes: General Use, Temporary Closure, Seasonal Closure, No Take Zone, Gear Restriction, Managed Access, Harvesting Ban, Size Restriction, Habitat Protection, or Deforestation Ban.
editable


est_date
Date the management method was established/when the management method began applying to new species or habitat; MM/DD/YY
(this does not apply to temporary closures)
editable


close_date
Closing date of the managed area; MM/DD/YY
(this applies to temporary closures only)
editable


open_date
Opening date of the managed area; MM/DD/YY
(this applies to temporary closures only)
editable


mangrove_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for mangroves has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


seagrass_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for seagrass has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


reef_mon
Y/N - Indicates whether ecological monitoring for reefs has occurred within the management unit (unit_name).
editable


mgmt_body
The official governing body of the management_name
editable


regulation_type
The type of legal regulation. The predefined list includes: village head regulation, village head decree, joint village head regulation or none.
editable


admin3_fish
The list of admin3s that fish, harvest or recreate within the management_name.
editable


admin3_fish_flag
The flag will be red if one of the admin3s listed in the ‚Äúadmin3_fish‚Äù column does not exist in the admin3_ref.
BV


admin3_govern
The list of admin3s that have a role in governing the management_name.
editable


admin3_govern_flag
The flag will be red if one of the admin3s listed in the ‚Äúadmin3_govern‚Äù column does not exist in the admin3_ref.
BV


management_fishing_ground
The list of fishing grounds associated with the management_name. The dropdown list is connected to the ‚Äúname‚Äù column in the fishing_ground_ref.
editable


fishing_ground_flag
The flag will be red if one of the fishing grounds listed in ‚Äúmanagement_fishing_ground‚Äù does not exist in the fishing_ground_ref.
BV


target_group
Target species group for the management_method. This can include ‚ÄòAll‚Äô, one or multiple species groups. The dropdown list is connected to the MASTER species_ref and includes species groups from all partners.
editable


target_species
Target species for the management_method. This can include ‚ÄòAll_species‚Äô, one or multiple scientific species. The dropdown list is connected to the MASTER species_ref and includes species from all partners.
editable


species_flag
The flag will be red if the ‚Äútarget_species‚Äù chosen is not referenced in the partner‚Äôs species_ref.
BV


target_habitat
Target habitat for the management_method. The predefined dropdown list includes the habitat choices: reef, seagrass, mangrove, mud_flat, sand, deepwater or other.
editable


management_area_ha
Size of the management_name in hectares (ha). Keep in mind this is the area of the management_name or zone ONLY. All management_names associated with a management_unit will be totaled to generate a total area for the management unit (unit_name). Only the most recent temporary closure area will be included.
editable


management_lat
Latitude of management_name
editable


management_long
Longitude of management_name
editable


partner_ID
Partner name with no spaces and no punctuation, only underscores. The dropdown list is connected to the ‚Äúname‚Äù column in the org_ref.
editable


partner_flag
The flag will be red if the ‚Äúpartner‚Äù value does not exist in the org_ref
BV


spatial_data
Indicates if the management_name has a match in the shapefile attribute table. If you‚Äôd like to submit any new spatial boundaries (management areas, habitat, communities, etc), upload the spatial files to this form. The management_name will be used to link spatial data to the management_ref, so any spatial boundaries that are sent should include the management_name in the attribute table of the shapefile.
BV


bv_started_work
The formula in this column brings in the most recent date from the start_date column in the admin3_ref, based on the communities listed in the admin3_fish column in the management_ref.
BV


bv_stopped_work
The formula in this column brings in the most recent end_date from admin3_ref only if every community in the admin3_fish column in management_ref has a corresponding end_date in admin3_ref. In other words, if three admin3_fish communities are associated with a management area, and one community has an end date in the admin3_ref, the bv_stop_date will remain blank in the management_ref because two communities are still active. A date will only appear in the bv_stop_date column if all admin3_fish communities have an end_date in the admin3_ref.
BV


raw_data_id
Unique ID to be able to join Smartsheet records to archived Airtables
BV


airtable_closure_ref
Unique ID assigned to closures in Airtable
BV


airtable_notes
Notes brought over from Airtable to assist in updating/correcting data in Smartsheet management_ref
BV


management_unique
Concatenation of lmma_id + lmma_name + management_id + management_name + open_date + close_date +est_date ¬†to identify unique Temporary Closure events and management methods within management areas
BV

title: Quick Guide
text:
Matadalan lalais ne‚Äôe fornese orientasaun pasu-ba- pasu atu halibur no omologa dadus peska no komunidade liuhosi sistema. Matadalan ida-ne‚Äôe rezumu prosesu halibur dadus no deskreve protokolu sira atu atualiza arkivu refer√©nsia no tabela kontrolu kualidade.
Ami dezenvolve formul√°riu peskiza haat atu halibur dadus kona-ba peska no peska komunidade sira. Deskrisaun levantamentu detalladu bele hetan iha matadalan kompletu iha lian Ingles, Lian Indonezia, Cebuano, Fransa, Tagalog, Swahili, Malagazi, Espana, Portuges no Tetun.
Peskiza Monitorizasaun Rai nian kaptura dadus m√≠nimu, idealmente loron-loron ka dala barak liu, ne‚Äôeb√© presiza hodi halo monitorizasaun ba tend√©nsia sira iha produsaun peska nian ba tempu naruk, kompozisaun esp√©sie sira, no val√≥r kapturasaun nian. Peskiza ida-ne‚Äôe bele tulun avalia efeitu husi enserramentu peska ka estrat√©jia jestaun sira seluk liu husi kompara dadus molok no hafoin implementasaun. Peskiza ne‚Äôe badak no amigavel ba utilizad√≥r hodi permite kolesaun dadus ne‚Äôeb√© konsistente no konsistente liu.
Peskiza Profiling Rai nian halibur dadus peska detalladu kona-ba sas√°n, esforsu, no sa‚Äôe ikan individu√°l ka invertebradu hamutuk ho informasaun espesializadu ba esp√©sie espes√≠fiku sira hanesan seksu, kualidade kaptura, dadus estilu, no maturidade manu-tolun. Kualidade kaer oktopu inklui m√©todu armazenamentu, k√≥r, n√∫meru tentasaun, abrasoens f√≠ziku, kualidade beik, no kondisaun kulit. Dadus estilu oktopu inklui amostra fotografia no sirkunst√°nsia kresimentu. Dadus kona-ba maturidade manu-tolun konta kona-ba manu-tolun nia todan, k√≥r, faze, naruk, no li√±a iha manu-tolun nia okos. Dadus hirak-ne‚Äôe komplementa dadus monitorizasaun no ajuda parseiru sira atu komprende di‚Äôak liu tan tend√©nsia kapturasaun ne‚Äôeb√© observa ona iha produsaun peska no efeitu sira husi jestaun peska. Peskiza ne‚Äôe deze√±a atu hala‚Äôo iha in√≠siu envolvimentu iha komunidade ida no tuir mai hala‚Äôo kada tinan ida to‚Äôo tinan rua, molok no hafoin implementa estrat√©jia jestaun nian, ka tuir nesesidade atu esplika mudansa sira iha kapturasaun ne‚Äôeb√© observa liuhosi dadus monitorizasaun nian.
Peskiza Profiling Komunidade halibur kompriensaun komprehensivu ida kona-ba paizajen sosio-ekonomiku no peska komunidade nian. Peskiza ne‚Äôe uza bainhira ulukliu envolve ho komunidade ida no repete bainhira apropriadu atu dokumentasaun mudansa boot iha hahalok peska, persepsaun peskad√≥r, no jestaun rekursu. Freku√©nsia levantamentu sei depende ba √°mbitu projetu (ezemplu, bainhira hein katak mudansa sei akontese).
Peskiza Peskas Uma-kain nian kaptura informasaun detalladu kona-ba peskad√≥r uma-kain nian, hanesan persepsaun nivel uma-kain nian kona-ba atividade sira ne‚Äôeb√© relasiona ho peska, fonte rendimentu, atividade loroloron nian, esp√©sie ikan prinsip√°l sira ne‚Äôeb√© kaer, depend√©nsia ba ikan ba ai-han, no atividade peska. Peskiza ne‚Äôe uza bainhira ulukliu envolve ho komunidade ida no repete kada tinan rua to‚Äôo tinan lima ka hafoin jestaun intervensaun sira atu dokumenta mudansa iha hahalok peska, persepsaun peskad√≥r, efik√°sia jestaun, seguransa ai-han, konfiansa, no igualdade j√©neru.




Prepara dadus refer√©nsia

Dadus refer√©nsia sira bele atualiza liu husi telemovel no iha informasaun komprehensivu kona-ba nivel administrativu komunidade peska sira-nian (nasaun, prov√≠nsia, distritu/municipalidade, suku/komunidade), fatin ba rai-maran, peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus, dadus esp√©sie, √°rea jestaun, tipu habitat, tipu gear, no organizasaun parseria.
Dadus refer√©nsia sira uza atu halo lista dropdown iha formul√°riu levantamentu KoboToolBox no hamutuk ho dadus adision√°l sira ne‚Äôeb√© presiza ba an√°lize hanesan koordenadu suku no peskad√≥r j√©neru.
Atualiza dadus refer√©nsia ho esp√©sie foun, peskad√≥r sira, sosa-nain sira, fatin ba rai, suku sira, no seluk tan ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atu halibur dadus iha √°rea foun sira.
Importante tebes katak arkivu hirak-ne‚Äôe atualiza ona atu bele halibur dadus no analiza ho diak. Fail refer√©nsia sira-ne‚Äôe hatama ba k√≥bo kada oras 12-24.




Estabelese Konta KoboToolbox

Peskiza hotu-hotu administra liuhosi uza formul√°riu KoboToolBox. Formul√°riu levantamentu ida-idak bele fahe ho konta KoboToolBox.
Estabelese Ita-nia Konta Kobo Toolbox iha server jer√°l iha https://kf.kobotoolbox.org/accounts/signup/
Fav√≥r kontaktu ekipa ho ita-boot nia informasaun kona-ba konta Kobo no naran utilizad√≥r atu nune‚Äôe bele fahe formul√°riu ne‚Äôeb√© apropriadu ho ita-boot nia konta.




Download aplikasaun KoboCollect.

Formul√°riu Kobo bele hetan asesu liu husi aplikasaun telemovel Android ne‚Äôeb√© gratuita ka liu husi formul√°riu Enketo.

Formul√°riu todan iha KoboCollect App. Haree Setup Kobo atu hetan matadalan adision√°l.

Bainhira download tiha aplikasaun nee, estabelese server URL, Naran Naran no Liafuan Lia-bosok, ne‚Äôeb√© liga ita-nia aplikasaun KoboCollect ba server KoboToolbox. Ida ne‚Äôe permite ita atu download formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© implementa husi KoboToolbox ba ita-nia dispozisaun movel no m√≥s haruka dadus ne‚Äôeb√© halibur liu husi aplikasaun fila fali ba server. Atu hetan URL, uza website- https://kc.kobotoolbox.org.
Ita bele asesu ba ‚ÄúProjetu Setting‚Äù hodi klike iha ikon iha parte loos leten iha uma-laran.
Iha telemovel nia oin, haree m√≥s ‚ÄúWhare Formulariu‚Äù.
Lista ida kona-ba formul√°riu levantamentu hotu ne‚Äôeb√© implementa ona tenke aprezenta. Imprensa ‚ÄúSelesaun hotu‚Äù atu haruka formul√°riu levantamentu hotu-hotu ba aplikasaun ka hili formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© ita hakarak atu iha liuhosi hili manualmente. Tuirmai, klike iha ‚ÄúHaree didi‚Äôak‚Äù.
Importante katak peskiza sira-ne‚Äôe atualiza beibeik hodi asegura katak versaun foun husi formul√°riu ne‚Äôe uza daudaun atu labele hamosu problema iha kadoras dadus. Enkuantu formul√°riu web automatikamente atualiza bainhira iha versaun foun ida husi levantamentu ne‚Äôe, utilizad√≥r sira tenke konfigura ‚Äúatualizasaun automatika‚Äù iha aplikasaun. Ita bele halo atualizasaun hodi ba ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù no ‚ÄúJestaun Formasaun‚Äù.




Halibur dadus ho formul√°riu levantamentu KoboToolBox

Halibur dadus hodi hili ‚ÄúStart New Form‚Äù iha aplikasaun KoboCollect. Haree instrusaun detalladu kona-ba halibur dadus uza aplikasaun iha Kobo Setup.
Iha livru ne‚Äôe nia rohan, hili ‚ÄúFinaliza‚Äù. Se Ita hakarak atu hakerek formul√°riu antes haruka, hili ‚ÄúSalva hanesan esbosu.‚Äù Se Ita hili atu hakerek livru ‚ÄúSalva hanesan esbosu‚Äù, Ita sei haruka Ita-nia formul√°riu ba ‚ÄúDrafts‚Äù. Iha ne‚Äôe, ita bele halo edisaun ba formul√°riu sira molok ita hatama ba dadus fin√°l. Bainhira Ita troka tiha ona, hili ‚ÄúHalo to‚Äôo rohan‚Äù, hanesan temi ona iha leten. Bainhira ha‚Äôu hili tiha ona ‚ÄúFinanlizasaun‚Äù, ida-ne‚Äôe sei halo tuir ‚ÄúReady atu haruka.‚Äù Iha versaun atu√°l Kobo nian, ita sei bele edita formul√°riu sira iha ne‚Äôe. Maib√© iha futuru, ita sei la bele edita bainhira sira remata tiha, no ‚ÄúReady atu haruka‚Äù sei sai de‚Äôit fatin atu rai formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© remata tiha ona to‚Äôo ita iha ligasaun ba intern√©t hodi haruka ba ita-nia servisu. Hili ‚ÄúHaruka selesionadu‚Äù atu haruka formul√°riu hotu-hotu ba server.
Dadus ne‚Äôeb√© halibur ho aplikasaun ka formul√°riu web sei hamoos no rai iha sistema armazenamentu dadus sentr√°l ida. Dadus primeiru hetan apoiu iha baze dadus KoboToolbox.




Valida dadus iha Smartsheet

Dadus hotu-hotu ne‚Äôeb√© suli liu husi sistema dadus peska nian hetan validasaun iha Smartsheet. Matadalan ba instrusaun pasu-ba- pasu kompletu atu kompleta prosesu ne‚Äôe bele hetan iha p√°jina Validasaun Dadus.
Dadus haruka ba validasaun iha sen√°riu rua nia okos; 1) naran foun ba peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus ka esp√©sie sira aumenta manualmente iha Kobo Kollect, ka 2) val√≥r numeriku ida monu liu husi limite ne‚Äôeb√© estabelese ona. Tenke verifika antes inklui iha set dadus fin√°l, haree iha dashboard, no aumenta ba arkivu refer√©nsia sira.
Kualk√©r naran foun ka dadus ne‚Äôeb√© iha bandeira sei haruka ba tabela kontrolu kualidade relevante iha Smartsheet ba ekipa kampu sira atu omologa. Tabela kontrolu kualidade ne‚Äôe espes√≠fiku ba parseiru no bele asesu liu husi pedidu atualizasaun ne‚Äôeb√© haruka ba ita-nia e-mail ka liu husi vizita ligasaun Vizaun din√°mika ne‚Äôeb√© fornese ba ita-boot sira. Lideransa ekipa kampu nian sei hetan notifikasaun liuhosi email bainhira presiza hetan validasaun dadus iha tabela sira.
Validasaun naran foun: Bainhira tama naran foun ida durante kolesaun dadus, enkargus hirak-ne‚Äôe automatikamente refere ba arkivu refer√©nsia sira atu avalia se iha ona arkivu refer√©nsia sira, maib√© partikularmente la hanesan. Kualk√©r artigu ne‚Äôeb√© hanesan sei aumenta ba tabela iha koluna ‚Äúref_match‚Äù nia okos. Lideransa ekipa sira-ne‚Äôe fasil atu verifika se dadus ‚Äúfoun‚Äù ne‚Äôe iha ona fail refer√©nsia sira. Lider ekipa sira sei kompleta koluna ‚Äúvalidasaun_opsaun‚Äù iha tabela ida-idak liuhusi hili dadus foun, dadus ne‚Äôeb√© refer√©nsia liu husi arkivu refer√©nsia (hanesan ‚Äúref_match‚Äù), seluk, ka hasai tiha. Se ita hili ‚Äúseluk‚Äù ida, ita tenke f√≥ naran ida iha koluna ‚Äúseluk‚Äù. Karik ne‚Äôe hanesan naran esp√©sie lok√°l foun ida-ne‚Äôeb√© presiza hetan validasaun, sei fornese koluna ida ho foto ne‚Äôeb√© foti durante kolesaun dadus ba refer√©nsia.
Validasaun val√≥r numeriku ho avizu limite: Ba kualk√©r dadus ne‚Äôeb√© iha bandeira, lideransa ekipa nian sei kompleta validasaun dadus iha koluna ‚Äúkorretu‚Äù liuhusi hili Y ( sin, val√≥r sira loos), N (no, val√≥r sira la loos), ka hasai tiha (dadu sira labele hetan validasaun no tenke hasai tiha husi dadus master). Se la hili (N‚Äô), val√≥r loloos ba n√∫meru ka denominador tenke tama iha koluna ‚Äúkorretu_numerador‚Äù no ‚Äúkorretu_denominador‚Äù.
Bainhira verifika tiha ona dadus iha tabela validasaun, ita sei aplika informasaun foun ba arkivu refer√©nsia no fornese korretu neses√°riu ba dadus master.




Atualiza tradusaun sira-nia kartaun

Tradusaun ba l√≠ngua hotu-hotu kompleta hodi edita surat-tahan ne‚Äôeb√© apropriadu iha telemovel.

Haree no uza dadus

An√°lize no vizualizasaun automatiku sei disponivel liu husi dashboard padraun. Dadus sei disponivel liu husi download iha dashboard ka ligasaun direta ba baze dadus seluk.


Fav√≥r ida, f√≥-hatene ami se imi iha pergunta ruma.
Obrigadu!

Kualidade kaer oktopu inklui m√©todu armazenamentu, k√≥r, n√∫meru tentasaun, abrasoens f√≠ziku, kualidade beik, no kondisaun kulit. Dadus estilu oktopu inklui amostra fotografia no sirkunst√°nsia kresimentu. Dadus kona-ba maturidade manu-tolun konta kona-ba manu-tolun nia todan, k√≥r, faze, naruk, no li√±a iha manu-tolun nia okos. Dadus hirak-ne‚Äôe komplementa dadus monitorizasaun no ajuda parseiru sira atu komprende di‚Äôak liu tan tend√©nsia kapturasaun ne‚Äôeb√© observa ona iha produsaun peska no efeitu sira husi jestaun peska. Peskiza ne‚Äôe deze√±a atu hala‚Äôo iha in√≠siu envolvimentu iha komunidade ida no tuir mai hala‚Äôo kada tinan ida to‚Äôo tinan rua, molok no hafoin implementa estrat√©jia jestaun nian, ka tuir nesesidade atu esplika mudansa sira iha kapturasaun ne‚Äôeb√© observa liuhosi dadus monitorizasaun nian.
Peskiza Profiling Komunidade halibur kompriensaun komprehensivu ida kona-ba paizajen sosio-ekonomiku no peska komunidade nian. Peskiza ne‚Äôe uza bainhira ulukliu envolve ho komunidade ida no repete bainhira apropriadu atu dokumentasaun mudansa boot iha hahalok peska, persepsaun peskad√≥r, no jestaun rekursu. Freku√©nsia levantamentu sei depende ba √°mbitu projetu (ezemplu, bainhira hein katak mudansa sei akontese).
Peskiza Peskas Uma-kain nian kaptura informasaun detalladu kona-ba peskad√≥r uma-kain nian, hanesan persepsaun nivel uma-kain nian kona-ba atividade sira ne‚Äôeb√© relasiona ho peska, fonte rendimentu, atividade loroloron nian, esp√©sie ikan prinsip√°l sira ne‚Äôeb√© kaer, depend√©nsia ba ikan ba ai-han, no atividade peska. Peskiza ne‚Äôe uza bainhira ulukliu envolve ho komunidade ida no repete kada tinan rua to‚Äôo tinan lima ka hafoin jestaun intervensaun sira atu dokumenta mudansa iha hahalok peska, persepsaun peskad√≥r, efik√°sia jestaun, seguransa ai-han, konfiansa, no igualdade j√©neru.




Prepara dadus refer√©nsia

Dadus refer√©nsia sira bele atualiza liu husi telemovel no iha informasaun komprehensivu kona-ba nivel administrativu komunidade peska sira-nian (nasaun, prov√≠nsia, distritu/municipalidade, suku/komunidade), fatin ba rai-maran, peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus, dadus esp√©sie, √°rea jestaun, tipu habitat, tipu gear, no organizasaun parseria.
Dadus refer√©nsia sira uza atu halo lista dropdown iha formul√°riu levantamentu KoboToolBox no hamutuk ho dadus adision√°l sira ne‚Äôeb√© presiza ba an√°lize hanesan koordenadu suku no peskad√≥r j√©neru.
Atualiza dadus refer√©nsia ho esp√©sie foun, peskad√≥r sira, sosa-nain sira, fatin ba rai, suku sira, no seluk tan ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atu halibur dadus iha √°rea foun sira.
Importante tebes katak arkivu hirak-ne‚Äôe atualiza ona atu bele halibur dadus no analiza ho diak. Fail refer√©nsia sira-ne‚Äôe hatama ba k√≥bo kada oras 12-24.




Estabelese Konta KoboToolbox

Peskiza hotu-hotu administra liuhosi uza formul√°riu KoboToolBox. Formul√°riu levantamentu ida-idak bele fahe ho konta KoboToolBox.
Estabelese Ita-nia Konta Kobo Toolbox iha server jer√°l iha https://kf.kobotoolbox.org/accounts/signup/
Fav√≥r kontaktu ekipa ho ita-boot nia informasaun kona-ba konta Kobo no naran utilizad√≥r atu nune‚Äôe bele fahe formul√°riu ne‚Äôeb√© apropriadu ho ita-boot nia konta.




Download aplikasaun KoboCollect.

Formul√°riu Kobo bele hetan asesu liu husi aplikasaun telemovel Android ne‚Äôeb√© gratuita ka liu husi formul√°riu Enketo.

Formul√°riu todan iha KoboCollect App. Haree Setup Kobo atu hetan matadalan adision√°l.

Bainhira download tiha aplikasaun nee, estabelese server URL, Naran Naran no Liafuan Lia-bosok, ne‚Äôeb√© liga ita-nia aplikasaun KoboCollect ba server KoboToolbox. Ida ne‚Äôe permite ita atu download formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© implementa husi KoboToolbox ba ita-nia dispozisaun movel no m√≥s haruka dadus ne‚Äôeb√© halibur liu husi aplikasaun fila fali ba server. Atu hetan URL, uza website- https://kc.kobotoolbox.org.
Ita bele asesu ba ‚ÄúProjetu Setting‚Äù hodi klike iha ikon iha parte loos leten iha uma-laran.
Iha telemovel nia oin, haree m√≥s ‚ÄúWhare Formulariu‚Äù.
Lista ida kona-ba formul√°riu levantamentu hotu ne‚Äôeb√© implementa ona tenke aprezenta. Imprensa ‚ÄúSelesaun hotu‚Äù atu haruka formul√°riu levantamentu hotu-hotu ba aplikasaun ka hili formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© ita hakarak atu iha liuhosi hili manualmente. Tuirmai, klike iha ‚ÄúHaree didi‚Äôak‚Äù.
Importante katak peskiza sira-ne‚Äôe atualiza beibeik hodi asegura katak versaun foun husi formul√°riu ne‚Äôe uza daudaun atu labele hamosu problema iha kadoras dadus. Enkuantu formul√°riu web automatikamente atualiza bainhira iha versaun foun ida husi levantamentu ne‚Äôe, utilizad√≥r sira tenke konfigura ‚Äúatualizasaun automatika‚Äù iha aplikasaun. Ita bele halo atualizasaun hodi ba ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù no ‚ÄúJestaun Formasaun‚Äù.




Halibur dadus ho formul√°riu levantamentu KoboToolBox

Halibur dadus hodi hili ‚ÄúStart New Form‚Äù iha aplikasaun KoboCollect. Haree instrusaun detalladu kona-ba halibur dadus uza aplikasaun iha Kobo Setup.
Iha livru ne‚Äôe nia rohan, hili ‚ÄúFinaliza‚Äù. Se Ita hakarak atu hakerek formul√°riu antes haruka, hili ‚ÄúSalva hanesan esbosu.‚Äù Se Ita hili atu hakerek livru ‚ÄúSalva hanesan esbosu‚Äù, Ita sei haruka Ita-nia formul√°riu ba ‚ÄúDrafts‚Äù. Iha ne‚Äôe, ita bele halo edisaun ba formul√°riu sira molok ita hatama ba dadus fin√°l. Bainhira Ita troka tiha ona, hili ‚ÄúHalo to‚Äôo rohan‚Äù, hanesan temi ona iha leten. Bainhira ha‚Äôu hili tiha ona ‚ÄúFinanlizasaun‚Äù, ida-ne‚Äôe sei halo tuir ‚ÄúReady atu haruka.‚Äù Iha versaun atu√°l Kobo nian, ita sei bele edita formul√°riu sira iha ne‚Äôe. Maib√© iha futuru, ita sei la bele edita bainhira sira remata tiha, no ‚ÄúReady atu haruka‚Äù sei sai de‚Äôit fatin atu rai formul√°riu sira ne‚Äôeb√© remata tiha ona to‚Äôo ita iha ligasaun ba intern√©t hodi haruka ba ita-nia servisu. Hili ‚ÄúHaruka selesionadu‚Äù atu haruka formul√°riu hotu-hotu ba server.
Dadus ne‚Äôeb√© halibur ho aplikasaun ka formul√°riu web sei hamoos no rai iha sistema armazenamentu dadus sentr√°l ida. Dadus primeiru hetan apoiu iha baze dadus KoboToolbox.




Valida dadus iha Smartsheet

Dadus hotu-hotu ne‚Äôeb√© suli liu husi sistema dadus peska nian hetan validasaun iha Smartsheet. Matadalan ba instrusaun pasu-ba- pasu kompletu atu kompleta prosesu ne‚Äôe bele hetan iha p√°jina Validasaun Dadus.
Dadus haruka ba validasaun iha sen√°riu rua nia okos; 1) naran foun ba peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus ka esp√©sie sira aumenta manualmente iha Kobo Kollect, ka 2) val√≥r numeriku ida monu liu husi limite ne‚Äôeb√© estabelese ona. Tenke verifika antes inklui iha set dadus fin√°l, haree iha dashboard, no aumenta ba arkivu refer√©nsia sira.
Kualk√©r naran foun ka dadus ne‚Äôeb√© iha bandeira sei haruka ba tabela kontrolu kualidade relevante iha Smartsheet ba ekipa kampu sira atu omologa. Tabela kontrolu kualidade ne‚Äôe espes√≠fiku ba parseiru no bele asesu liu husi pedidu atualizasaun ne‚Äôeb√© haruka ba ita-nia e-mail ka liu husi vizita ligasaun Vizaun din√°mika ne‚Äôeb√© fornese ba ita-boot sira. Lideransa ekipa kampu nian sei hetan notifikasaun liuhosi email bainhira presiza hetan validasaun dadus iha tabela sira.
Validasaun naran foun: Bainhira tama naran foun ida durante kolesaun dadus, enkargus hirak-ne‚Äôe automatikamente refere ba arkivu refer√©nsia sira atu avalia se iha ona arkivu refer√©nsia sira, maib√© partikularmente la hanesan. Kualk√©r artigu ne‚Äôeb√© hanesan sei aumenta ba tabela iha koluna ‚Äúref_match‚Äù nia okos. Lideransa ekipa sira-ne‚Äôe fasil atu verifika se dadus ‚Äúfoun‚Äù ne‚Äôe iha ona fail refer√©nsia sira. Lider ekipa sira sei kompleta koluna ‚Äúvalidasaun_opsaun‚Äù iha tabela ida-idak liuhusi hili dadus foun, dadus ne‚Äôeb√© refer√©nsia liu husi arkivu refer√©nsia (hanesan ‚Äúref_match‚Äù), seluk, ka hasai tiha. Se ita hili ‚Äúseluk‚Äù ida, ita tenke f√≥ naran ida iha koluna ‚Äúseluk‚Äù. Karik ne‚Äôe hanesan naran esp√©sie lok√°l foun ida-ne‚Äôeb√© presiza hetan validasaun, sei fornese koluna ida ho foto ne‚Äôeb√© foti durante kolesaun dadus ba refer√©nsia.
Validasaun val√≥r numeriku ho avizu limite: Ba kualk√©r dadus ne‚Äôeb√© iha bandeira, lideransa ekipa nian sei kompleta validasaun dadus iha koluna ‚Äúkorretu‚Äù liuhusi hili Y ( sin, val√≥r sira loos), N (no, val√≥r sira la loos), ka hasai tiha (dadu sira labele hetan validasaun no tenke hasai tiha husi dadus master). Se la hili (N‚Äô), val√≥r loloos ba n√∫meru ka denominador tenke tama iha koluna ‚Äúkorretu_numerador‚Äù no ‚Äúkorretu_denominador‚Äù.
Bainhira verifika tiha ona dadus iha tabela validasaun, ita sei aplika informasaun foun ba arkivu refer√©nsia no fornese korretu neses√°riu ba dadus master.




Atualiza tradusaun sira-nia kartaun

Tradusaun ba l√≠ngua hotu-hotu kompleta hodi edita surat-tahan ne‚Äôeb√© apropriadu iha telemovel.

Haree no uza dadus

An√°lize no vizualizasaun automatiku sei disponivel liu husi dashboard padraun. Dadus sei disponivel liu husi download iha dashboard ka ligasaun direta ba baze dadus seluk.


Fav√≥r ida, f√≥-hatene ami se imi iha pergunta ruma.
Obrigadu!

title: Reference Files
text:
Arkivu refer√©nsia hotu-hotu atualiza iha Smartsheet Dynamic View. Arkivu refer√©nsia sira serve hanesan inputs ba lista dropdown iha formul√°riu KoboToolbox no kontein dadus ne‚Äôeb√© aumenta ba dadus master liu husi konjuntu. Sira iha informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© komprensivu kona-ba nivel administrativu komunidade peska sira (nasaun, prov√≠nsia, distritu, suku), fatin ba rai-maran, rai peska, peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus, esp√©sie, √°rea jestaun, tipu sas√°n no organizasaun parseria sira. Pasu sira iha kraik esplika oins√° atu atualiza fail refer√©nsia ho informasaun foun.
Pasu 1: Halo konta ne‚Äôeb√© livre.

Bele kria konta gratuita ida iha https://www.smartsheet.com/
Hili ‚ÄúHaree smart sheet ho gratuita‚Äù

Pasu 2: Fornese Blue Ventures (BV) diresaun e-mail ne‚Äôeb√© uluk ita kria ita-nia konta smartsheet.

Atu haree ita-nia arkivu refer√©nsia sira ita presiza asina iha smartsheet Dynamy View uza ita-nia kredensi√°l smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Bainhira tama tiha ona iha Vizaun din√°mika (laos aplikasaun smartsheet), ita sei haree lista arkivu refer√©nsia sira ne‚Äôeb√© fahe ho ita-nia konta (Figura 1).

Bainhira loke tiha, ita bele klike iha li√±a ida-idak atu halo edisaun ba dadus ne‚Äôeb√© eziste, ka klike iha knotak ‚ÄúNew‚Äù iha parte loos leten atu aumenta dadus foun (Figura 2).
Pain√©l detallu ida sei hatudu iha parte loos iha ne‚Äôeb√© ita bele hatama informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© presiza (Figura); Tabela 1). Hili ‚Äúsave‚Äù iha parte loos okos husi pain√©l detallu bainhira ita remata atualiza.
Atu husik koment√°riu ruma ka husu pergunta ruma ba ekipa, hili tabela ‚ÄúKordenador‚Äù iha pain√©l detallu. Ema hotu-hotu ne‚Äôeb√© fahe fail refer√©nsia, inklui ekipa BV, sei simu notifikasaun bainhira halo koment√°riu, nune‚Äôe la presiza marka ema ida-idak.

Pasu 4: Responde atu atualiza pedidu bainhira dadus lakon ka la loos, ka atu hat√°n ba koment√°riu ruma.

Karik iha informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© la kompletu ka la loos ne‚Äôeb√© esensi√°l ba populasaun Kobo dropdowns ka ba konjuntu, ka karik halo koment√°riu iha surat-tahan, sei haruka pedidu atualizasaun ba utilizad√≥r apropriadu hotu-hotu, hodi f√≥ lalais informasaun ne‚Äôe atu atualiza ka hat√°n ba koment√°riu (Figura 4). Tuir loloos, ema hotu ne‚Äôeb√© iha asesu ba ita-nia arkivu refer√©nsia sei simu pedidu atualizasaun.
Prevee dadus ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza ka responde ba sei hatudu iha mensajen e-mail nia okos, maib√© ita sei la bele atualiza dadus ruma diretamente iha e-mail

Iha e-mail nia okos, iha ligasaun ba ‚ÄúBa iha surat-tahan‚Äù; maib√©, surat-tahan ne‚Äôe limitadu ona. Fav√≥r haree fali ita-nia dadus ka hat√°n ba koment√°riu liuhosi pedidu nakloke.

Klike iha knotak ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù iha mensajen e-mail.
Janela navegador intern√©t foun sei loke ho setup hanesan formul√°riu ba kada entrada (Figura 5)
Halo revizaun ba kampu sira-ne‚Äôe no halo populasaun ba kampu sira ne‚Äôeb√© edita.

Atu hasai tiha (hanesan se ita seidauk hatene resposta ida-ne‚Äôeb√© atu hili) klike ‚Äù Tuirmai‚Äù la halo selesaun iha koluna edivel sira. Sei haree m√≥s informasaun tuirmai ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza.
Se ita presiza sai husi p√°jina ne‚Äôe ka para molok atualiza tiha ona, ita tenke salva ita-nia desizaun bainhira ita loke fali pedidu ne‚Äôe. Bainhira loke tiha ona, klike de‚Äôit ‚Äù Tuirmai‚Äù to‚Äôo ita hetan informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza.
Bainhira ita haree informasaun ikus, klike iha ‚ÄúHaree.‚Äù Mensajen pop-up sei mosu hodi husu se Ita-Boot mak ‚ÄúReady atu hato‚Äôo Ita-Boot nia atualizaun?

Klike ‚ÄúBa kotuk‚Äù se ita presiza haree fali
Klike ‚ÄúHaree Atualizasaun‚Äù atu hato‚Äôo Ita-nia atualizaun.
Ita-boot sira-nia atualizasaun automatikamente aplika ba arkivu refer√©nsia no ita bele haree iha Vizaun din√°mika

Pergunta beibeik:

Bainhira ha‚Äôu aumenta administrad√≥r foun ida1, to‚Äôo bainhira mak presiza molok ida-ne‚Äôe mosu iha dropdown ba administrad√≥r2?


Ida ne‚Äôe sei lori maizumenus minutu 15 molok iha dropdown din√°miku sira bele hetan tama. Ida ne‚Äôe aplika ba admin2 dropdown iha admin3_ref, esp√©sie_grupu dropdown iha gear_ref, admin3 dropdown iha sosa-nain_ref, fisher_ref, data_koletor, etc. Haree Figura 5 ba lista kompletu kona-ba dropdown din√°miku no sira-nia fluxu servisu liu husi arkivu refer√©nsia sira.


Bainhira ha‚Äôu aumenta ka atualiza fail refer√©nsia, to‚Äôo bainhira mak ha‚Äôu presiza atu atualiza iha peskiza Kobo?


Imi tenke haree formul√°riu Kobo ne‚Äôeb√© atualiza iha maizumenus oras 12-24.


Oins√° mak tenke rejista naran sosa-na‚Äôin, peskad√≥r no koletor dadus sira-nian?


Idealmente, naran sira-ne‚Äôe tenke √∫niku liu ba ema ida-idak no inklui sira-nia naran primeiru, naran ikus no naran-boot. Se ema ida lakohi fahe sira-nia naran ikus tomak, ita m√≥s bele uza karta inisi√°l ka primeiru husi sira-nia naran ikus.

Ligasaun dropdown din√°mika entre arkivu refer√©nsia sira.

title: Reference Files
text:
Arkivu refer√©nsia hotu-hotu atualiza iha Smartsheet Dynamic View. Arkivu refer√©nsia sira serve hanesan inputs ba lista dropdown iha formul√°riu KoboToolbox no kontein dadus ne‚Äôeb√© aumenta ba dadus master liu husi konjuntu. Sira iha informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© komprensivu kona-ba nivel administrativu komunidade peska sira (nasaun, prov√≠nsia, distritu, suku), fatin ba rai-maran, rai peska, peskad√≥r, sosa-nain, koletor dadus, esp√©sie, √°rea jestaun, tipu sas√°n no organizasaun parseria sira. Pasu sira iha kraik esplika oins√° atu atualiza fail refer√©nsia ho informasaun foun.
Pasu 1: Halo konta ne‚Äôeb√© livre.

Bele kria konta gratuita ida iha https://www.smartsheet.com/
Hili ‚ÄúHaree smart sheet ho gratuita‚Äù

Pasu 2: Fornese Blue Ventures (BV) diresaun e-mail ne‚Äôeb√© uluk ita kria ita-nia konta smartsheet.

BV sei fahe fail refer√©nsia sira ne‚Äôeb√© asosiadu ho ita-nia organizasaun.
Atu haree ita-nia arkivu refer√©nsia sira ita presiza asina iha smartsheet Dynamy View uza ita-nia kredensi√°l smartsheet: https://dynamicview.smartsheet.com/login
Bainhira tama tiha ona iha Vizaun din√°mika (laos aplikasaun smartsheet), ita sei haree lista arkivu refer√©nsia sira ne‚Äôeb√© fahe ho ita-nia konta (Figura 1).

Figura 1: Lista arkivu refer√©nsia sira iha Vizaun din√°mika

Pasu 3: Klike iha fail refer√©nsia atu halo atualizaun

Bainhira loke tiha, ita bele klike iha li√±a ida-idak atu halo edisaun ba dadus ne‚Äôeb√© eziste, ka klike iha knotak ‚ÄúNew‚Äù iha parte loos leten atu aumenta dadus foun (Figura 2).
Pain√©l detallu ida sei hatudu iha parte loos iha ne‚Äôeb√© ita bele hatama informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© presiza (Figura); Tabela 1). Hili ‚Äúsave‚Äù iha parte loos okos husi pain√©l detallu bainhira ita remata atualiza.
Atu husik koment√°riu ruma ka husu pergunta ruma ba ekipa, hili tabela ‚ÄúKordenador‚Äù iha pain√©l detallu. Ema hotu-hotu ne‚Äôeb√© fahe fail refer√©nsia, inklui ekipa BV, sei simu notifikasaun bainhira halo koment√°riu, nune‚Äôe la presiza marka ema ida-idak.

Figura 2: Ezemplu vizaun husi admin2_ref iha Vizaun din√°mika

Figura 3: Ezemplu vizaun husi pain√©l detallu admin2_ref iha Vizaun din√°mika

Pasu 4: Responde atu atualiza pedidu bainhira dadus lakon ka la loos, ka atu hat√°n ba koment√°riu ruma.

Karik iha informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© la kompletu ka la loos ne‚Äôeb√© esensi√°l ba populasaun Kobo dropdowns ka ba konjuntu, ka karik halo koment√°riu iha surat-tahan, sei haruka pedidu atualizasaun ba utilizad√≥r apropriadu hotu-hotu, hodi f√≥ lalais informasaun ne‚Äôe atu atualiza ka hat√°n ba koment√°riu (Figura 4). Tuir loloos, ema hotu ne‚Äôeb√© iha asesu ba ita-nia arkivu refer√©nsia sei simu pedidu atualizasaun.
Prevee dadus ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza ka responde ba sei hatudu iha mensajen e-mail nia okos, maib√© ita sei la bele atualiza dadus ruma diretamente iha e-mail

Iha e-mail nia okos, iha ligasaun ba ‚ÄúBa iha surat-tahan‚Äù; maib√©, surat-tahan ne‚Äôe limitadu ona. Fav√≥r haree fali ita-nia dadus ka hat√°n ba koment√°riu liuhosi pedidu nakloke.

Klike iha knotak ‚ÄúOpen Request‚Äù iha mensajen e-mail.
Janela navegador intern√©t foun sei loke ho setup hanesan formul√°riu ba kada entrada (Figura 5)
Halo revizaun ba kampu sira-ne‚Äôe no halo populasaun ba kampu sira ne‚Äôeb√© edita.
Klike tuir mai iha telemovel nia okos hodi muda liu husi kada entrada ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza.
Atu hasai tiha (hanesan se ita seidauk hatene resposta ida-ne‚Äôeb√© atu hili) klike ‚Äù Tuirmai‚Äù la halo selesaun iha koluna edivel sira. Sei haree m√≥s informasaun tuirmai ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza.
Se ita presiza sai husi p√°jina ne‚Äôe ka para molok atualiza tiha ona, ita tenke salva ita-nia desizaun bainhira ita loke fali pedidu ne‚Äôe. Bainhira loke tiha ona, klike de‚Äôit ‚Äù Tuirmai‚Äù to‚Äôo ita hetan informasaun ne‚Äôeb√© presiza atualiza.
Bainhira ita haree informasaun ikus, klike iha ‚ÄúHaree.‚Äù Mensajen pop-up sei mosu hodi husu se Ita-Boot mak ‚ÄúReady atu hato‚Äôo Ita-Boot nia atualizaun?

Klike ‚ÄúBa kotuk‚Äù se ita presiza haree fali
Klike ‚ÄúHaree Atualizasaun‚Äù atu hato‚Äôo Ita-nia atualizaun.
Ita-boot sira-nia atualizasaun automatikamente aplika ba arkivu refer√©nsia no ita bele haree iha Vizaun din√°mika


Figura 4: Ezemplu ‚ÄúAtualiza pedidu‚Äù e-mail bainhira presiza korrije informasaun ka hato‚Äôo koment√°riu.

Tabela 1: Kampu prinsip√°l sira iha kada arkivu refer√©nsia. Tipu kampu ‚ÄúBV‚Äù jere husi Blue Ventures no la editavel. Atu husu alterasaun ba kualk√©r kampu ‚ÄúBV‚Äù fav√≥r ida, husik koment√°riu. Bele edita de‚Äôit kampu sira ho tipu kampu ‚Äúeditavel‚Äù. Tipu kampu ‚Äúauto‚Äù mak populasaun automatikamente.

Pergunta beibeik:

Bainhira ha‚Äôu aumenta administrad√≥r foun ida1, to‚Äôo bainhira mak presiza molok ida-ne‚Äôe mosu iha dropdown ba administrad√≥r2?


Ida ne‚Äôe sei lori maizumenus minutu 15 molok iha dropdown din√°miku sira bele hetan tama. Ida ne‚Äôe aplika ba admin2 dropdown iha admin3_ref, esp√©sie_grupu dropdown iha gear_ref, admin3 dropdown iha sosa-nain_ref, fisher_ref, data_koletor, etc. Haree Figura 5 ba lista kompletu kona-ba dropdown din√°miku no sira-nia fluxu servisu liu husi arkivu refer√©nsia sira.


Bainhira ha‚Äôu aumenta ka atualiza fail refer√©nsia, to‚Äôo bainhira mak ha‚Äôu presiza atu atualiza iha peskiza Kobo?


Imi tenke haree formul√°riu Kobo ne‚Äôeb√© atualiza iha maizumenus oras 12-24.


Oins√° mak tenke rejista naran sosa-na‚Äôin, peskad√≥r no koletor dadus sira-nian?


Idealmente, naran sira-ne‚Äôe tenke √∫niku liu ba ema ida-idak no inklui sira-nia naran primeiru, naran ikus no naran-boot. Se ema ida lakohi fahe sira-nia naran ikus tomak, ita m√≥s bele uza karta inisi√°l ka primeiru husi sira-nia naran ikus.

Ligasaun dropdown din√°mika entre arkivu refer√©nsia sira.

title: Belize
text:
How to Use this Guide


This resource is designed for quick and accurate identification of local marine life. The guide is based on a country‚Äôs species reference file and organized by scientific family. Each entry features four key elements:




Local Name(s): Common regional names for the species.




Scientific Name: The precise Latin binomial (Genus species). If the species is unknown, the genus or family can also be entered. If only the genus is known, type the name of the genus followed by ‚Äúsp‚Äù (as opposed to ‚Äúspp‚Äù or sp.‚Äù). If only the family is known, type the name of the family (i.e.¬†Lutjanidae).




English Common Name: The widely recognized English name for the species.




Photo: A visual aid for positive identification.




Taxonomic classification organizes marine life into a nested hierarchy from broadest to most specific. Both fishes and invertebrates belong to the Domain Eukaryota and Kingdom Animalia. Fishes are primarily classified under the Phylum Chordata because they possess a backbone (as vertebrates), with most species belonging to the Class Actinopterygii (ray-finned fishes) or Chondrichthyes (cartilaginous fishes). In contrast, marine invertebrates‚Äîwhich lack a backbone‚Äîare distributed across numerous phyla, including Mollusca (e.g., clams, squid), Arthropoda (e.g., crabs, shrimp), and Cnidaria (e.g., jellyfish, corals). This system proceeds through Order, Family (Lutjanidae), Genus (Lutjanus sp), and Species, providing a universal, standardized name for every organism, such as the Red Snapper, Lutjanus campechanus.

title: Cabo Verde
text:
How to Use this Guide


This resource is designed for quick and accurate identification of local marine life. The guide is based on a country‚Äôs species reference file and organized by scientific family. Each entry features four key elements:




Local Name(s): Common regional names for the species.




Scientific Name: The precise Latin binomial (Genus species). If the species is unknown, the genus or family can also be entered. If only the genus is known, type the name of the genus followed by ‚Äúsp‚Äù (as opposed to ‚Äúspp‚Äù or sp.‚Äù). If only the family is known, type the name of the family (i.e.¬†Lutjanidae).




English Common Name: The widely recognized English name for the species.




Photo: A visual aid for positive identification.




Taxonomic classification organizes marine life into a nested hierarchy from broadest to most specific. Both fishes and invertebrates belong to the Domain Eukaryota and Kingdom Animalia. Fishes are primarily classified under the Phylum Chordata because they possess a backbone (as vertebrates), with most species belonging to the Class Actinopterygii (ray-finned fishes) or Chondrichthyes (cartilaginous fishes). In contrast, marine invertebrates‚Äîwhich lack a backbone‚Äîare distributed across numerous phyla, including Mollusca (e.g., clams, squid), Arthropoda (e.g., crabs, shrimp), and Cnidaria (e.g., jellyfish, corals). This system proceeds through Order, Family (Lutjanidae), Genus (Lutjanus sp), and Species, providing a universal, standardized name for every organism, such as the Red Snapper, Lutjanus campechanus.

text:
How to Use this Guide


This resource is designed for quick and accurate identification of local marine life. The guide is based on a country‚Äôs species reference file and organized by scientific family. Each entry features four key elements:




Local Name(s): Common regional names for the species.




Scientific Name: The precise Latin binomial (Genus species). If the species is unknown, the genus or family can also be entered. If only the genus is known, type the name of the genus followed by ‚Äúsp‚Äù (as opposed to ‚Äúspp‚Äù or sp.‚Äù). If only the family is known, type the name of the family (i.e.¬†Lutjanidae).




English Common Name: The widely recognized English name for the species.




Photo: A visual aid for positive identification.




Taxonomic classification organizes marine life into a nested hierarchy from broadest to most specific. Both fishes and invertebrates belong to the Domain Eukaryota and Kingdom Animalia. Fishes are primarily classified under the Phylum Chordata because they possess a backbone (as vertebrates), with most species belonging to the Class Actinopterygii (ray-finned fishes) or Chondrichthyes (cartilaginous fishes). In contrast, marine invertebrates‚Äîwhich lack a backbone‚Äîare distributed across numerous phyla, including Mollusca (e.g., clams, squid), Arthropoda (e.g., crabs, shrimp), and Cnidaria (e.g., jellyfish, corals). This system proceeds through Order, Family (Lutjanidae), Genus (Lutjanus sp), and Species, providing a universal, standardized name for every organism, such as the Red Snapper, Lutjanus campechanus.
